“BuuuuuoOOOOOORPHH!!!”

​The tremendous, nearly-deafening belch reverberated off the several dunes of sand and rattled the prickly needles off their perch in the cacti, a stark contrast to the girlish laughter that followed.

​“Ooh, that was a good one! These Rare Candies really make a gal heavy! Hehe!”

The colossal human turned Snorlax giggled once more at her massive belch. Once, she had been a small, lithe, and graceful little thing. She owned a respectable water type Pokemon Gym, she had traveled a good portion of the Pokémon Workd, battling trainers and forging bonds. Now, however, her former grace had vanished as surely as her diminutive size. Since that fateful day she had eaten her first rate candy, Misty’s transformation into a Snorlax, as well as her waistline, began to blossom like a flower.

The candies that fell out from the plane? Gone. All of them were gone. As she steadily devoured the powerful treats, her body began to thicken rapidly, unused to the sheer number of calories and fats contained within the spongy treats. Her already generous hips grew wider, padding out with soft chub and making her paws cause veritable earthquakes throughout the loose sand. Her chest had begun to swell, and her blue furred thighs expanded to new proportions. Her cream-furred belly began to protrude outwards, growing softer and rounder until she sported a rather soft and wobbly wrecking ball. The girlish Snorlax gorged her gullet and stuffed herself silly until finally, she returned the crates only to find them empty.

​Then, she ate the crates themselves.

At first, Misty didn’t understand what made her want to even consider the option. There was no more food in sight, yet her stomach kept demanding for more and more. Without much thought she almost immediately crunched up a bit of the material from the crate and popped into her mouth. It tasted like metal, but her powerful teeth chewed through it all the same and sent it into her esophagus. And then she grabbed another piece, and then another, serving only to bloat the Snorlax our further and further with soft blubber.

​Now, she was truly massive. She sat in the center of where the crates of fattening Rare Candies had been, patting what little of her belly she could reach and listening to the near-constant burbles and gurgles emanating from within as it worked to process the mountains of sugar and metal she regularly shoveled in. Her belly fat had overtaken her legs in length and surged across the sand, creating a massive ball of blubber separated into three huge rolls, with a titanic crater of a belly-button in between. And yet, no matter how much she stuffed within, she still felt ravenous.

There was one bit of food she had not yet considered, however.

Jessie still layed unconsciously on the sand, and with nothing else in sight save for the sand itself, Misty began to eye her up. When she was human, the thought of eating another one of her kind was disgusting to her. But her humanity was drowned out in a sea of Snorlax and blubber, and the world had a new, more edible perspective. But it still felt very alien. She had eaten candies and raw metal, but until this point nothing...meaty.

Does her human side win out and decide to go someplace to sate her ravenous appetite? Does she give into her Pokémon urges and pass the point of no return?

12133211221111112.content:
Ash was anxious. He had already gone through several gyms across the region of Kanto, him and his trusty Raichu. With the use of the little mouse Pokemon's special powers they were able to easily conquer the vicious rock Pokemon of Brock, the first gym leader. After that, he tried to batttle the Cerulean Gym, but someone else was alredy challenging the Gym leader, Misty, so he skipped her. The second gym leader Lt. Surge was a little tougher, her Pokemon being of the electric variety, and thus required the aid of the newly caught Butterfree that Ash had been diligently training alongside his starter companion.

Now that he had two badges secured firmly underneath his belt and his trek back towards the gym of the water type leader Misty almost completed, he was ready to begin the trial to obtain the third badge. His Raichu, now having since evolved to a Pikachu, chirped approvingly upon noticing that they were closer to the gym by passing through the latest route. They had already defeated several trainers along the way and were about to pass the border into Cerulean City until...

"Hey You!"

Ash and Raichu turned around to see a young boy holding a Pokeball in his hand. "Are you planning on taking on the Gym Leader, Misty?"

Ash exchanged glances between Raichu. "Uhh...yeah?"

Richard kept himself from laughing. "I'm afraid she's...*Ahem* Out right now. She won't be back for a while."

"Oh, how long do you think she'll be?"

"Hard to say. It could be hours, days, weeks..."

"WEEKS?! I can't stay here for weeks! I'm on a Pokemon Journey!"

"Maybe me and you should have a little sparring match to pass the time. It will help hone your Pokemon's skills for when she returns. And belive me, your gonna need them."

It was true about what Richard was saying. Misty is a pretty powerful gym leader, a young woman whom, at an age only a handful more than Ash himself, had already earned her reputation as a talented Water Pokemon enthusiast. She also had some other talents, but Ash did not know much about it himself. He only cared about what Pokemon she had and what tactics he would have to employ to be able to defeat her. He couldn't have cared any less about what Misty herself was like.

"Alright," Ash nodded his head, "There's nothing wrong with a quick little match to get better, right Raichu?"

"Rai!"


Ash and Richard walked over to quiet clearing in the woods outside the city to battle. Ash walked up to his side of the field and looked around for anyone else nearby. He didn't seem to see any other trainers around, or even any Pokemon.. He strained his ears to try and catch the sound of someone wandering about, but he couldn't hear anything. It seemed like Richard was waiting for Ash's approval to start the battle. he smiled and waived his hand, signalling he was ready. Richard returned the smile and tossed his Pokeball into the air.

However, the beam that erupted from the ball continued to grow mid air. Richard didn't seem fazed, yet as the Pokemon's body continued to form from the Pokeball, Ash realized that this one was not so ordinary in the slightest. A shadow started to appear around Ash's body. Ash's Raichu and pidgeotto cowered behind Ash to protect themselves.

The lumbering shadow belonged to none other than the gym leader and former Human Misty. Her form finnaly materialized and she cascaded to the ground with incredible agility and aerodynamic control, something that probably should have been far outside of her capabilities as a human being. Misty came crashing down onto the battlefield right in front of Ash. Ash's jaw dropped as far as it was allowed to go. Before him was surely the largest Pokemon he had ever seen in his entire life.

The Pokemon's eyes blinked at him, most likely trying to adjust from being in a Pokeball. "Hey there, stranger!" The Pokemon talked "Oh, a GOOD-LOOKING stranger too! Ha ha ha!"

Ash was so taken aback by this Pokemon's size that he forgot to respond to her (he was assuming It was a her because of her deep, feminine voice and her swollen breasts) right away. He came to the conclusion that this was a Snorlax, but he had expected to meet one of them on his journey. In his mind he always pictured them to be only slightly chubby with a lot of muscle to compensate for it. However, he didn't think that they would actually be so enormous. She wasn't large because she possessed a great deal of musculature on her person, however.

She was enormous because she was actually incredibly obese. Her dark blue and cram colored fur somehow complimented her bright red hair. Her belly jutted out far in front of her, so far that it almost brushed up against Ash's own chest, even though he was a respectable distance away from where she was actually standing. She had her face, which was adorned with humongous cheeks, coupled with two sharp lower teeth protruding from her mouth, beaming so brightly form the glistening saliva that it almost had Ash feel like he needed to put on a pair of shades.

She had forearms as three times as wide as the Trainer's own torso and legs that could easily have been sturdier than the skin of an Onix. However, somehow she managed to stay standing on those legs with all of her bulk hanging off of her, and she made it look easy to boot. Although she had yet to turn around in front of him, Ash couldn't help but think about how huge that Snorlax's bottom should be along with the rest of her.

With her height compounded by her excessive weight, Misty towered over the young man just as much as she outdid him in width. She gave her stomach a slap, one that, when her palm connected with her tummy's surface, sent out a rippling wave that flowed across her entire body all at the same time. She laughed out loud. She had a slightly deep voice thanks to all of the fat bunching up around her face and neck. Ash shook his head and mentally derided himself for getting distracted by this Pokemon's appearance. No need to be intimidated.

"Misty! Come back over hear." Richard called from his side of the clearing. "This is the battle I was talking about earlier. We need to see you skills as a Snorlax before we take on any other Gym Leaders!"

'Misty? Huh, that's funny" Ash desperately tried to not let his voice be sharked with fear. "He named you after the Town's gym leader, heh heh..."

The Snorlax looked back at Ash, blinking her eyes. "I am that Misty" She said before walking away.

"Oh, that's nice."Ash responded, not really soaking in what she just told him "...Wait what?"

"So are you ready to fight, or are you having second thoughts? I can tell by that look in your eye that you're not quite sure what to do next." Richard said as he saw Ash's flustered expression from his side.

Ash breathed in and he breathed out. He wasn't going to let himself back out of this one. He had traveled long and far to make it here. He had fought against many trainers, caring for his Pokemon carefully, and teaching them the best moves he possibly could to let them be victorious in battle. Just because the POKEON intimidated him should have meant nothing at all. He retrieved a Pokeball from his belt and held it out in front of him.

"I'll take you on, Richard!"

"Ha ha ha ha! Oh, some spirit! I like that! I like that a whole lot!" Misty licked her lips and grinned. Ash sighed. He hoped to win this battle quickly so he could leave and not have to think about this Snorlax women ever again.

Misty put her hands onto her knees, bending slightly forward. She raised one leg high, a thickened thigh that scrunched up in her action, and she brought it crashing down onto the clearing with such force that it nearly sent Ash and Richard flying backwards. Misty laughed. She proceeded to do the same with her other leg. She was now a woman of impeccable size and girth and she was not afraid to show it off. She was actually beginning to sorta enjoy this new body.

After practicing her movements a few more times, making the ground beneath Ash and Richard tremble with each step, Misty finally felt it was time to battle. The fat Snorlax-Human hybrid creature made a gesture for Ash to send out his first Pokemon. Thus, Ash's Pigeotto stepped out from between his trainers legs.

As the two opposing forces combated one another, Ash tried not to look too much at Misty and keep his eyes pinned to his own Pokemon. However, it was very difficult to ignore her, given how she continued to make teasing glances in his general direction. She would rub her belly in ways he supposed were meant to be sensual and she also continued to slap herself all over to make herself wobble too. Ash blushed despite himself. As Pidgeotto collapsed against the strength of her, Ash snapped out of his dread to realize what had just happened. His Pokemon had been defeated.

"Oops! It looks like you were a little too DISTRACTED," Misty laughed, making her belly bounce. "And your Pokemon ended up being beaten! I hope you have another one with you!"

"O-Of course I do. I'll send out Raichu next! Right, Raichu!?"

"...chu..." he meekly responded.

It was a dark, stormy afternoon for Ash, Misty, and Brock. Our heroes were all together in a lab, owned by an old friend of Prof. Oak's named Prof Wysteria.

She was a redheaded, scatterbrained woman with long bushy hair, as well as a top Pokemon genetics researcher and was studying genetic traits that allowed Pokemon to learn certain moves.

She, Brock, and Ash were currently in the kitchen eating lunch, but Misty had gotten lost looking for the bathroom. She had forgotten to ask Prof. Wysteria where

"Ohhh...Where is it?" Misty asked herself as she ran around frantically. She was looking around from room to room and it didn't help that none of the doors were marked.

Misty eventually came across a room near the lab. She entered not noticing that it was a gene scrambling room. The professor was going to put a Pokemon of another type in the room and alter it's genes to more closely resemble a Miltanks.

It was set to go off after one minute of a subject being there, and unfortunately for Misty there was a toilet in the room (Wysteria had managed to potty train all her Pokemon).

"Thank goodness!" Misty cried as she went in and relieved herself. Soon, the machine went off and there was a bright flash of light.

Misty had wondered what was going on, but left anyway.

141.content:
Depression can do a lot to a person.

Misty had spent four years away from Ash, the sight of his face in the forefront of her mind, constantly seeing his face whenever she took a moment to rest from gym leading. On the whole, it was a rather stressful four years, yet at the same time awfully empty. Nothing truly happened at all during that four years in Misty's life. Trainers came into the gym, trainers fought her, and then they either left with a Cascade Badge or, more often than not, left empty handed.

The only thing Misty did other than fight Pokemon battles for those four years was swim, which was something she did quite frequently. She'd go for a dip in the pools of Cerulean Gym, or perhaps go off to some other body of water to both train and have some fun. The simple fact of the matter was that, for all intents and purposes, she was bored. Deeply and profoundly bored, not to mention sad.

The only joyous things that happened to her was when she'd see Ash on the television, when someone would bring up something nostalgic from the past, or, best yet, have a run in with the guy she knew she was in love with. It's strange how she'd feel that strongly toward someone she only met when she was a little girl, but she was in love. There, it was out in the open, plain for all to see.

It was one day she went to visit Delia, however, that everything would change...

1411.content:
"Hey there, sweetie!" Delia laughed, opening the door for the young trainer, who held her hands behind her petite rear end, each finger interlocked with one another. Delia's lips curled into a smile, her cheeks dimpling in a way they hadn't before. Misty couldn't place it, but something was off even then.

"Hello, Mrs. Ket--"

"Don't be so formal. You can just call me Delia," the older woman laughed, waving her hand. Her hands seemed slightly thicker, less defined, the joints in her fingers less noticable amongst the slight layer of pudge. It was then that Misty picked up on the difference: Ash's mom had put on a small amount of weight. It wasn't significant, no. Just a slightly rounder face, her smooth skin puffed out over her body, her breasts slightly larger, her belly larger than that, but her hips and derriere being the metaphorical cherry on the top of the cake. In fact, her body sort of resembled a cake, but, of course, she wasn't fat, not even chubby, just pudgy.

"Okay, so why'd ya call me down?" Misty asked, her lips twitching ever so slightly, "Is Ash coming home soon?"

"Well, I really don't know anything about that," laughed Delia as she guided Misty into her kitchen, "But I did hear he was in the Sinnoh League right now in the semi-finals, so I'd keep your fingers crossed he'd come back for a little bit."

There was a sensation in the gym leader's chest, a moment of utter stillness before all jubilation radiated from every artery and orafice in the muscle tissue. It was an instant, a slow, shocking second, but it was one filled with stomach flipping euphoria and excitement. Coming back! Coming back! Those words never held that same power as they did now.

Delia smiled at this, and turned toward the oven, bending over so her soft, juicy butt cheeks strained the seat of her pants for an instant before she rose up, holding, in her gloved hands, a gigantic cake. She placed it on the table, smiling as Misty stared at it, in awe. "I thought you might want to try out this little cake I'm working for at that restaraunt I'm opening up over in Pallet Town."

"You're opening up a restaraunt?" Misty stammered, a smile on her lips.

"Well, you know how it is. Kid out of the house, nothing to do all day, it's something fun that can fill the time and my wallets," Delia laughed, placing her hands on her gently convex belly. Evidentally, as Misty noticed, it also filled her stomach, but that was an inpolite thing to say to such a great woman.

"So when is it opening?"

"Few weeks. Just testing out the menu. Mind trying out some of this cake? Tell me if it's any good or not?"

"I don't have a problem with that." Misty harpooned the cake, and, shrugging with a grin, swallowed a forkful of the fluffy, delicious cake. Her lips curled into a broad smile as she appreciated the magnitude of the flavor, the texture, everything! She took a second forkful, and another, until the slice had disappeared. "Uh, Mrs. Ke--er--Delia, may I have a se--"

"Go right ahead. Don't be ashamed to eat as much of it as you want," Delia laguhed.

Misty ended up devouring half of the cake. She slumped backwards, hands resting on her slightly distented belly as she sighed, the pressure from within forcing her belly to pull against her jeans, a strained, yet not necessarily unwelcomed, sensation. A sensation of everything pushing out from within, from a single focal point, against every surface, a pressure slowly descending deeper and deeper into her body as the food was digested. She smiled, contentedly, as Delia took a slice for herself to test it out. Judging by the significantly larger slice she cut for herself next, a smile on her lips.

141112.content:
The intoxicating aroma of freshly prepared breakfast slowly roused Misty from her sleep. She groaned and opened her eyes, a small smile dimpling her cheeks. Breakfast in bed was not something she was used to, but her time at Delia's house had quickly changed that. Grunting, she lifted herself up to get a good look at what was on her breakfast tray this morning: a very large omelet, a huge helping of hash browns, and two pieces of buttered toast with liberal amounts of grape jelly slathered on. A perfect meal guaranteed to fill any room her stomach made overnight and then some. Pudgy fingers grabbed at the fork, and Misty dug in.

         As soon as the first bite reached her lips, Misty's body switched into auto-pilot. She didn't even think about how much she was eating or how fast she was eating it. In truth, she wasn't really thinking at all. She just ate and ate and ate some more. It wasn't out of any obligation to clear her plate, either. Out of all the changes Misty's life went through in the last few days, the only one she failed to notice was the trance she went into during every meal. All that registered in her mind was the taste of Delia's wonderful cooking and the sensation of her stomach getting stuffed to max capacity and beyond.

         Said stomach's capacity was growing by the day, if not by the meal. Her food intake climbed dramatically along with it, and it was because of that that Misty's weight jumped up by an astounding 150 pounds. Her belly was a butterball that stuck out nearly a foot in front of her. If it weren't for the constant eating, it would have most likely sagged halfway down her thighs. Those thighs, while not quite tree trunk status, were certainly well on their way. It was nearly impossible for Misty to keep them from touching. Her hips had grown to the width of her chunky shoulders, and her waist didn't fare any better. Both butt cheeks had plumped up to the size of small beach balls and provided an admittedly comfortable layer of padding wherever she sat down. Higher up on her body, a double chin and rounded face were held up by her fat neck. Her arms joined in on the plumping up as well, plumping up to nearly twice their old size. Even her breasts got in on the action and jumped up a full cup size. The changes were staggering, to say the least. Her regular clothes would only snap if she ever tried putting them on, so she had to borrow some of Delia's maternity clothes, and those were quickly becoming too tight. And even then, Misty still had to get used to lugging around her ever increasing weight.

         Yet she was still growing fond of it all the same.

         Her fork clanged against the plate, and Misty's eyes lost their distant, hazy look. She sighed in contentment and rubbed her belly.

         "Ah, another good breakfast."

         There was a knock at the door, and Delia walked in. The older woman regarded Misty with a warm, affectionate smile.

         "Good morning, Misty," she said. "Did you like your meal?"

         Misty burped. "Good morning, Delia. And yeah, perfect as always."

         Delia giggled and raised an eyebrow. "Are you referring to me, or my cooking?"

         The hefty gym leader sputtered and blushed. Delia just giggled again, then picked up the meal tray and set it at the foot of the bed. She sat next to Misty's belly and tried to look her in the eye, but Misty was trying to look anywhere else. Eventually, though, her gaze did return to Delia and settled on her form.

         While not nearly as drastic, Ash's mother had certainly gained some fat of her own. It wasn't quite fat-fat, more pleasantly plump and soft. At least, that was how her hugs felt. Delia's fattening form was taking on a pear shape, with her hips being the most prominent of her assets. The phrase "child-bearing" came to mind whenever Misty looked at them. Everything else just had about half an inch of fat added on, but it still looked quite nice on Delia.

         A groan from Misty's stomach broke the silence. The younger woman smiled sheepishly and looked away again. Delia smiled back and laid a hand on top of the turgid sphere of flesh.

         "So..." Delia hummed in thought. "Any particular comments on your breakfast? Anything you'd like me to change?"

         Misty shook her head. "Not really. I think it was perfect."

         "Oh, thank you, dear! You're such a sweetheart!" Delia lightly rubbed a few circles in Misty's belly through the covers.

         "It's no big deal, really. I mean, you've been so nice to me these last few days..."

         "It's the least I could do for all your help! Thanks to you, I'm sure my restaurant will be a great success!" Delia's eyes lit up. "Oh, and speaking of which, Misty?"

         The younger woman tilted her head to one side. "Hm?"

         Delia's dimpled smile broadened. "Would you do me the honor of being my very first customer when I open up?"

         Misty didn't have to think twice. "Of course! I could never say no to your cooking."

         "Mmm, so I've noticed..." The older woman regarded Misty's figure. Even under the covers, there was no way to hide her ample girth. For a split second, there seemed to be a glimmer of sorts in Delia's eyes, but it vanished before Misty could even be sure it was actually there. "Anyway, do you want to move to the living room, or would you like to stay in bed a little longer?"

         "Um, I wouldn't mind moving to the living room. Help me up?"

         "Of course, dear."

         It took a couple tries for Misty to heave herself up to a standing position with Delia's help. After taking another few seconds to catch her breath, the corpulent gym leader waddled her way out of the guestroom, Delia following at her heels.

         For some reason, Misty couldn't shake the feeling Delia was watching her butt...

1411121.content:
"Will you be ready for lunch in a few minutes?" Delia called from the kitchen.

         Misty grunted in the affirmative from the sofa in the living room, her mouth too full of steak fries to form any proper words. She'd been snacking on them since getting out of bed. When asked why they weren't a part of breakfast, Delia said there wasn't enough room on the plates. The rotund gym leader didn't really give it much thought and munched on her fries. Nothing wrong with having "a little snack to tide you over", as Delia put it. It was hardly little, given the fact the fries had filled the large basket to the brim and then some when Misty first started on them, but her recent diet had left her idea of reasonable portions a tad different from what it once was.

         Not that any of this was on her mind at the moment. Aside from the delicious taste of the steak fries, nothing was. Not the fact her breakfast was probably bigger than last night's dinner and subsequent dessert (a hot fudge sundae huge enough to be a meal of its own), not the fact she'd only stopped eating long enough to move from her bed to the living room sofa, not the fact her supply of fries somehow hadn't run out yet, not even the fact she essentially accepted what was rapidly becoming her new life without much thought. Whatever was left of the old Misty was getting buried under adipose and gluttony...

------

         ... A fact Delia was all too aware of. The young mother smiled to herself as she sprinkled her special powder into the creamy chicken stew. It was probably unnecessary by this point, given how big Misty had gotten over just one week, but a little extra insurance never hurt. Besides, there was still plenty of the stuff left. Unless someone else came by and offered to be a taste tester, Misty--and Delia herself, to a lesser extent--would have to remain the only one to receive the wonderful effects of the powder.

         She's such a lovely young lady, Delia thought for about the millionth time that week. Never refusing any food, and enjoying every bite. I know I'm probably spoiling her, but she just seems so happy! And she looks so much better now that she has some meat on her bones!

         That last thought caused Delia to blush. As she moved from stirring the stew to adding her powder to a generously sized potato salad, her thoughts focused on Misty's hefty figure. There was so much of it to grab, to knead, to squeeze. All that soft flesh, and every square inch of it begged Delia to smother it all in affection. Just thinking about it made her cheeks burn. Fanning herself with her free hand, she realized her distracting thoughts caused her to add more powder than necessary. There was enough of it for the small, purple grains to stand out from the rest of the food. With a sheepish giggle, Delia placed the potato salad back in the refrigerator.

         "I'm sure she won't mind..." the plump mother assured herself. She wasn't exactly wrong, either. It wasn't hard to notice Misty's habit of zoning out whenever she was eating. Most attempts Delia made at conversation during those times ended in failure, save for the food-related ones, and those only got grunts out of the younger woman.

         Whether it was due to the powder or the ever-increasing portions, Delia couldn't be sure. It didn't matter much to her either way; as long as Misty was properly fed and happy, everything else was small potatoes. And speaking of small potatoes...

         "She's probably running low by now," the plump mother mused. "And it looks like there's just enough fries for one last refill. I know I told her a few minutes, but something tells me she won't notice if I take a little longer." She giggled. "Honestly, I could lay on that big belly of her's and she wouldn't even realize it!"

         Delia paused. That last part probably wasn't even an exaggeration. She could lay on Misty's belly and get away with it. In fact, there were probably quite a few things she could do to Misty's belly. And it wasn't just an assumption, either. On a few occasions, she'd rubbed the gluttonous gym leader's stomach to help with the digestion (and maybe for more personal, perverted reasons). So if she could get away with that much...

         A devious grin broke out across Delia's face.

------

         The extended snack came to an end, and with it came the return of Misty's awareness. Failing to stifle a burp, she gave her stomach a hardy pat. Taut again, as it almost always was. It was getting harder for the redhead to remember a time when it wasn't constantly stuffed, or bulbous, for that matter. As she rubbed circles in the orb of flesh, she took a moment to consider whether or not she'd be able to handle lunch.

         Of course, simply thinking about said meal made her mouth water. That settled it, then: her appetite wouldn't let her pass up one of Delia's fantastic meals, no matter how full she felt. Plus the fullness she was feeling at the moment was less of the "fit to burst" kind and more of the "just satisfied at the moment" kind.

         "I wonder if I'll ever be hungry again," the gym leader mumbled. She tried kneading her belly, but it was too tight, so she resumed rubbing. "Delia's food is so good, I can't stop eating it. I'll be her number one customer when her restaurant opens, if I'm not too fat to get off this couch when it finally does open."

         She smiled. Despite the redhead's tremendous leap in weight, Delia never once chastised her for getting so fat. If anything, Delia only encouraged her growth with all the constant food. Misty was the only one around to give a second opinion on her menu, and Delia was always willing to offer seconds before they decided to switch to having bigger meals, so it made sense. It still didn't explain those strange looks or flirting that--

         Misty shook her head. She is not flirting with you, stupid! She's just being extra nice so you won't freak out about turning into a total fatty! She winced as she accidentally pushed too hard on her belly. A loud belch escaped her mouth, and she blushed. I hope she didn't hear that...

         Silly as it was, she couldn't help but fret over the possibility of Delia criticizing her for acting like a slob. Eating as much as she did was no excuse for wearing her food like some pig, after all. (Speaking of which, all the grease and crumbs on her mouth and hands needed cleaning up. Maybe she could do that after lunch.)

         "Misty!" Delia suddenly called in a singsong voice. "I hope you're not too full, 'cause lunch is ready!"

         Misty smiled at the kind woman as the enticing aroma of her meal wafted through the air. A bowl of extra creamy chicken stew that looked like it was trying to be more of a spaghetti bowl than a stew bowl, a potato salad big enough to serve at least two people (which had a light purple tint she paid no mind to), a bowl of various fruits twice as high as the bowl itself, and an entire pitcher of ice-cold water were neatly arranged on a tray Delia was somehow able to carry on her own.

         "Are you sure that's not too heavy?" Misty asked as she eyed the food.

         "Oh, don't worry your pretty little head, dear." Despite Misty's slouched position making her belly an ideal spot for the tray, Delia set it down on the coffee table instead. Placing a hefty meal on a taut stomach would only cause trouble. Picking up the steak fry basket, Delia added, "All that matters is keeping you fed and happy. Now enjoy yourself, and feel free to ask for more."

         With that, Misty slowly pushed herself into an upright position, grabbed a spoon, and dug in. The rest of the world seemed to fade around her as she took the first bite of the stew, and her gluttony once again took over. Lunch flew by in a haze of delicious tastes and enough voracity to impress any eating contest champion. A small voice in the back of the gym leader's head urged to at least slow down and savor the food a bit more, but her constant craving for more food wouldn't have any of that. On occasion, she could vaguely register the sensation of something touching her belly, but she chose to ignore it. No sense in wasting time pondering when it could be spent eating.

         The haze in her eyes began to fade once she finished chugging all the water, only to reappear at the sight and smell of more stew. Upon digging back in, Misty heard a distant voice. It sounded like it was talking about her meal. Assuming it was referring to how good the food was, she grunted in agreement and continued shoveling more stew in her mouth.

         After finishing the extra stew, Misty noticed a chocolate square partially hanging out of someone's mouth and hovering scant inches from her own. She leaned forward and bit down on it. Her lips made contact with the other person's...

14111211.content:
Her half of the chocolate eaten, Misty leaned back into the couch and returned to awareness. Delia was standing in front of her, staring with a somewhat distant look and a blush on her face. The two stared in silence for a moment before Misty cleared her throat.

         "Um, what is it?" she asked, the growing self-consciousness making her sport her own blush. "Did I make a mess?"

         "Hmm?" Delia blinked and stared for another moment. Her dazed look vanished and she shook her head. "O-oh, no, no, of course not! I was just, uh, just thinking about how much you seemed to enjoy yourself! Healthy appetites like yours are what keep me going, you know?"

         "Oh." Misty looked down at her belly and scratched it. "Well, that's good. I think. You don't mind having to buy so much food for me, do you?"

         The plump mother shook her head. "I told you not to worry your pretty little head, didn't I? Money's not an issue, so you're more than welcome to eat as much as you want."

         "If you say so," Misty mumbled in reply, still looking at her belly.

         "You know I do. Misty, deary, I want you to look at me." Delia waited a minute for the gym leader to look her in the eyes. "Thank you. Now I'd like to ask you something first: how do you feel about yourself right now?"

         "How do I feel...?" Misty's gaze returned to her stomach. "Hmm... Well, I guess..." She looked back up at Delia. "I guess I'm okay with myself. I mean, it's all happened so quickly, becoming your taste tester and getting fat and stuff. Realistically, I should be more worried about putting on all this weight so fast, but... It's just the way you treat me. I've never been so pampered in my life, and I love it. You make me feel like I can put my hair down and just indulge myself.

         "So I guess I'm trying to say I'm fine with myself, all things considered. I'm just worried about taking advantage of you. You're a really nice person, Delia, and I'd hate to do that to you "

         Delia's smile was face-splitting. Giggling, she bent down and wrapped the hefty younger woman in a hug. Misty returned it in kind.

         "Thank you, dear. You're a very nice person too, and you're definitely not taking advantage of me. I have plenty of money to keep feeding you, so there's no need to feel bad. You're a big eater, always have been. You just needed a little push to finally realize that. The fact you've gotten so big just means you're enjoying your appetite." She lightly touched the bulbous belly for emphasis. "And personally? I think you look all the better for it."

         Misty blushed. "Thanks, Delia. So, um, I should probably take a shower now before I forget. Just because I've turned into a fatty doesn't mean I should act like slob, after all. Would you mind helping me up?"

         Delia giggled again and extended her arms. "Of course, dear." With a wink, she added, "And don't be afraid to ask if you need help reaching anything."

         After a flustered thanks and a short bout of pulling her bulk off the couch, Misty waddled her way out of the living room to the bathroom, a dimpled smile adorning her cherubic face.

------

         Was she really okay with this?

         The question kept repeating over and over in Delia's mind. The plump mother bit her lip, and not just because she watched Misty waddle out of the room in her old and ill-fitting maternity clothes. No, it had more to do with the building moral crisis on her hands.

         She knew what she was doing raised some heavy questions. What sane woman would encourage a person to get so big, let alone use a strange substance to speed up the process? 150 pounds and counting in a week's time couldn't have been good for her body. Not to mention the fact she was preying on the young lady's uncertainty to convince her to accept being a total glutton and enjoy it. Misty claimed she was fine with her changes, but what if that wasn't the case? What if she just used the taste testing to justify her weight gain and really wanted to lose the weight? And the kiss Delia stole from her earlier couldn't have been considered acceptable in any part of the world, especially given that Misty showed no awareness of it! That was the very definition of taking advantage of someone!

         Even so, while the fattening was definitely her doing, she couldn't be entirely sure Misty's feelings on the situation were completely born of her manipulation. The powder definitely had an effect on one's appetite thanks to the rapid growth it caused, there was no denying that. But was everything else also because of Delia? Misty did say she loved the pampering, after all. Plus, she called herself a fatty without any underlying bitterness in her tone. Maybe she just saw the weight gain and constant eating as part of it. If that were the case, then there shouldn't be any problem fattening her up, right?

         Delia shook her head. She was just making excuses, and she knew it. Nothing could change the fact she was molding the poor girl to suit her own desires. Feeding her and letting her live here was still fine, but not if it meant continuing to taking advantage of her.

         "That decides it, then," she declared to the empty living room. "No more using the powder, no more keeping her stuffed all the time, no more feeding her when she can't eat more—" (though that'd stopped once Misty started having her eating trances a few days ago) "—no tricking her into getting fatter for me, and if she decides to lose weight..." She gulped. "If she wants to lose weight, then I'll help her."

         I just hope I can keep my word, she thought as she looked in the direction of the bathroom, her brow creased with worry. After the stunt I just pulled, I'm not sure how well I can control myself anymore...
14111211.title: Ever Oblivious

choices: "...have it now." Misty embraces total gluttony.
"...wait a bit first." Misty tries to rein in her eating habits.
141112111.content:
As a Water-type specialist, it only made sense for Misty to enjoy being in water. Swimming, bathing, even getting caught in the rain always felt right to her. The sisters would often joke about how she was part-fish, but she didn't let any of that bother her. They just couldn't appreciate a good shower the same way she did, like the one she was taking right now.

         In fact, the warm water cascading down on her felt even better than usual. Misty gave a pleasured sigh as she rubbed circles on her gut. She meant to just spread the water around a little faster, but the porky gym leader couldn't help but get lost in the sensation. It was so tight, so sensitive. Breakfast probably wasn't even fully digested yet, let alone her post-breakfast "snack" or lunch.

         "I never knew I could put away so much," she mused. "I guess Delia's right. I really am a big eater."

         "And personally? I think you look all the better for it."

         Misty couldn't help but blush. It was just Delia being nice, she knew that. Even so, that little compliment gave her a warm and fuzzy feeling she found herself enjoying more and more over the last few days. It was just as addicting as the food!

         "Food..." She looked over her body. It was impossible not to notice how much bigger it was, but the reality of it never seemed to totally sink in for her. Maybe the fact she piled on the pounds so fast made it all seem like it was just some fever dream. Regardless, she was fat now, and her new lifestyle seemed to revolve around getting fatter.

         "Am I okay with myself...?"

         Exercise seemed like such a foreign concept now. Gone was her routine of regular swim practice, and her limber body along with it. Her sisters would probably call her a beached Wailmer--or possibly even a beached Wailord--if she ever dared to return home in her present state. The thought alone was enough for her to seriously contemplate never setting foot in Cerulean City ever again. She'd be abandoning her duties as a gym leader, but if it meant avoiding days upon weeks upon months upon possibly years of potential verbal abuse from her sisters...

         Heck, the past week she spent with Delia felt more like home than her real home ever did. The loving mother had pretty much spoiled her by now, so much so Misty found herself apprehensive to the idea of leaving.

         "And I've still got taste testing to do!" she suddenly declared aloud. "Yeah, Delia's counting on me, and I can't just let her down! I mean, she doesn't need any help since her cooking's already perfect, but she just seems to so happy to cook for me! And I bet she's secretly nervous about her new restaurant and needs me to boost her confidence, too. If that means getting fat-- uh, fatter, then I'll get as fat as she needs me to be! I'll swallow every last delicious, scrumptious...irresistible..."

         Her breathing became heavy, and droll started to trickle down from the corner of her mouth. She wiped it away and shook her head. Being helpful was all well and good, but she still had to consider her well-being. Even if she didn't mind the weight, she knew letting things continue at their current pace would eventually lead to trouble.

         Setting her thoughts aside, Misty lathered and rinsed herself clean as quickly as she could, taking extra care to make sure she got under her fat folds as well. She turned the water off, stepped out of the shower, grabbed a towel, and began drying herself off. If nothing else, it helped her gain a better understanding of her body's folds and curves.

         Once that was done--and she finished spending more time than necessary on her belly--she hung up the towel and noticed a bath robe on the neighboring hanger. Shrugging to herself, she took it and tried it on. It fit pretty well, though it clung a bit to her middle.

         "It is the biggest thing about me, I guess." She shrugged again and ran her hands across the material. Nice and soft, and it even felt brand new. Delia didn't get it just for her, did she? Honestly, that woman had to be spoiling her on purpose!

         She tried to bend over and pick up her discarded clothes, but she was met with resistance from her giant gut. Deciding it was too much effort, Misty ditched the clothes pile and headed for the door. Catching sight of her reflection in her peripheral vision made her stop and do a double take. Aside from her orange hair and viridian eyes, nothing about her was recognizable. Puffy cheeks, a double chin that covered her neck... She could almost swear it was someone else's reflection.

         "Whoa..." She brushed her fingers across her second chin. Her reflection did the same. "Just when I thought I finally got used to this..."

------

         When Misty left the bathroom and returned to the living room, she found Delia waiting for her with her usual smile.

         "Ah," said the older woman, "you found the bath robe I got for you. How do you like it?"

         "It's great," Misty answered. She gripped the sides of her stomach. "Kinda tight around here, though."

         Delia waved her hand dismissively. "I'm sure it'll be fine once you've digested all your food."

         "Digested"?

         Misty looked over to the coffee table. Nothing there, aside from a magazine and some coasters. She looked back to Delia with a confused look on her face.

         "What's wrong, dear?"

         "Well..." Misty absentmindedly rubbed her gut. "Don't you usually have more food for me when I get out of the shower?"

         Delia blinked. "Oh? Oh, right! Of course! Silly me!" She giggled. "I have a post-shower snack ready for in case you wanted it, but since you had such a big lunch, I wasn't sure if you'd want anything or not."

         Seriously?

         "I know you've been eating a lot," Delia continued, "and I do very much appreciate your lovely appetite, but even you have your limits. I just thought I should try and exercise a bit more caution in feeding you."

         "Oh," Misty responded lamely. She drummed her fingers on her belly. "Well, um... I think I'll..."
141112111.title: Consideration

choices: After the snack, Misty asks for a belly rub. Delia agrees to it.
Days pass, and Delia's own weight gain steadily increases.
1411121111.content:
"Now?" Delia looked taken aback. "As in right now?"

         "Yeah," Misty replied. "Why, is that a problem?"

         The older woman bit her lip and looked away for a second. "No, not really, just..." She took an audible breath. "I'm just worried about forcing too much on you, that's all."

         Misty rolled her eyes. "Delia, I've done nothing but eat since I got here. Actually, I don't think I've even been hungry at all this last week. But the thing is, I really like it this way. Your food's always delicious, you always give me as much as I want, and... Well, I love this routine we've got going. I can eat a ton, anyway, so unless you're just being nice and I really am eating too much--"

         "No, no!" Delia interjected. "I told you everything's fine, and I meant it!" She smiled. "But alright then. If that's how you feel, I'll give you your snack. Just make yourself comfy and I'll be back in minute, okay sweetie?"

         Misty smiled back. "Sure thing. And thank you." With that, Delia left for the kitchen and Misty sat herself down on the couch. She was half-surprised she hadn't created a permanent butt groove yet, considering she always sat in the same spot. As the blubbery gym leader trailed her fingers down the curve of her belly, A small voice in her head began to speak up. It berated her for her choice, insisting she should turn down the snack and stop eating so much in general. However, those pleas were distant, and just barely audible over the sound of a second, much more audible voice.

         That's a good girl, it cooed. Eat to your heart's content. It's okay to be fat, because it just shows how much Delia cares for you. She gives you food to make you happy, and that food makes you fat. Getting fatter just means getting happier.

         Misty hummed in agreement. She liked this voice; it made sense, in a weird way.

         Delia's happy when you eat, too. Eating makes both of you happy. You want her happy, don't you?

         "I do," she whispered.

         Then you should eat as much as can, all day, every day. Ask for more, have bigger meals, tell her you'd love to do nothing but eat her food for the rest of your life. You'll make her so happy, and she'll want to do anything to make you happy too.

         "Yeah..." Misty looked to the ceiling, a smile dimpling her cheeks. "I'll make her the happiest woman alive."

------

         It felt like her legs would give out at any moment. Delia braced herself against the kitchen counter. Her breathing was heavy, and her cheeks burned intensely.

         "If I didn't know any better," she muttered with a nervous laugh, "I'd swear she was doing this to me on purpose."

         Seeing Misty balloon up under her care was one thing, but to know the young lady was readily accepting her gluttonous lifestyle made the plump mother...feel things. Things she probably shouldn't be feeling about one of her son's best friends. It was a huge relief she could feel a genuine loving intent underneath all the perversion. Still, with Misty getting bigger by the day and her meals growing alongside her to compensate, it was only a matter of time before...

         Delia shook her head. She already abused the sweet young lady's trust once, and even though she got away with it, a repeat performance was the last thing she wanted. Despite still being a little weak in the knees, she moved to the other end of the counter and picked up a platter of deluxe nachos. She then took a deep breath to steady her nerves a little.

         "It's her choice," she told herself, "and that's fine. She likes the constant food, and that's fine. She likes living this way, and that's fine. That's...fine."

         More than fine.

         Another deep breath, and Delia headed on back over to the living room, absentmindedly eating one of the chips.
1411121111.title: Accepting a New Life

choices: On second thought, Misty decides to leave the shopping to Delia.
Insist on going out. She may be a glutton, but she's not (completely) lazy. Yet.
14111211111.content:
The fog lifted over Misty's mind, and she looked at the platter. It was bare, save for some crumbs. She smiled and pat her belly heartily. Once again, she was back to her fit-to-burst level of fullness she'd come to love so much. Sure, there was some discomfort and even a little pain, but it was to the point where she could push those things to the back of her mind and focus on the bliss of feeling absolutely stuffed.

         Hey, she pretty much lived for it now, so why not?

         Rubbing circles in her belly through her bathrobe, Misty cooed at its tautness. Would it ever completely soften? Probably not, considering her increasingly insatiable appetite and food-lust. That was fine. More food simply meant more eating, and more attention from Delia. Also more fat, but that wasn't too much of an issue as long as she could still get up and walk around.

         As Misty continued to rub her belly, she realized something: at the rate she was gaining, it wouldn't be too long before she outgrew even Delia's maternity clothes. Thank goodness for the new bathrobe, otherwise she'd have to go totally naked!

         I'm way overdue for a shopping trip! Then again, maybe I could just stick to wearing this for now...

         No, I need to get some new clothes before it's too late. This robe won't last forever, and I know for a fact I'm about to outgrow the last of Delia's stuff. Better get out and do that now before it's too late.

         Come to think of it, when was the last time I went outside? A week ago? But that was when I first visited! Wow.

         The realization made Misty pause. She brought a hand up to her double chin and ran her pudgy fingers along it. She became so lost in her growing gluttony that she never set foot outside for a week...

         "Eh."

         Misty shrugged to herself and went back to rubbing. Delia needed someone to taste test her cooking, and there was a lot to test before the restaurant opened. It only made sense for Misty to spend so much time eating, especially with how much she was enjoying herself. Besides, they had to be running low on recipes by this point. They could afford to stop and go clothes shopping.

         I'd rather just eat, though...

------

         Logically speaking, there was no reason for Delia's hesitation. She just wanted to give Misty a napkin. No need to get cold feet over something like that.

         ... Well, it wasn't so much that as it was weak knees, so it made a little sense.

         Regardless, Delia took a deep breath and went to the living room. Naturally, Misty hadn't moved an inch. She was still rubbing her gloriously divine sphere of a belly.

         Delia cleared her throat. Misty stopped and looked up at her. Wordlessly, Delia handed over the napkin with her usual warm smile. Misty smiled back and thanked her.

         "How was it?" asked Delia.

         "Perfect, of course," Misty replied as she wiped the remaining bits of food off her face and hands. Delia's smiled widened a bit.

         "Thank you, dear. I know I say this all the time, but I really do appreciate all the help you've given me!"

         "And I really appreciate you letting me...basically live here for free. Really, you're the nicest person I've ever met."

         Hearing such praises warmed Delia's heart. "Of course! Anything for you, sweetie."

         Please don't read into that, please don't read into that, please don't read into that...

         Misty looked away, her face pensive. "In that case, could you..." She bit her lip. "This might sound a bit weird but could you, um... Could you help me rub my belly?"

         Delia stiffened, but she kept smiling. Fighting down her rising blush, she answered, "O-oh? I-I mean, oh, yes, of course! I did say anything, after all!"

         "T-thanks." Misty looked away and moved her hands to the sides of her belly. Was it Delia's imagination, or did she catch a glimpse of a blush...?

         To her credit, Delia managed to move in front of Misty and kneel down without her legs giving out. Her throat felt dry. Many inappropriate thoughts assaulted her mind.

         Was her breathing heavy? Were her cheeks flushed? Rather than ponder those questions, Delia tentatively placed one hand on Misty's belly at a time. The bathrobe was still on, so it wasn't quite as intimate. Heck, the playful squeezes Delia occasionally gave her were more indecent than this. One little massage wasn't going to lead to anything more; life didn't operate on the same rules cheap smut did. (Not that Delia read such things, of course!)

         "J-just--" Delia cleared her throat. That sounded way too husky! "Just let me know if I'm being too hard on you."

         "Sure," Misty mumbled in response. Delia didn't dare chance a look at her face.

         Finding her resolve--not to mention restraint--she began rubbing the swollen sphere. Even through the material of the robe, it was impossible not to notice how drum-tight it was. Delia kept her touch as light as she could. Misty reacted with a happy sigh. Grinning to herself, Delia began rubbing circles in the middle while Misty rubbed up and down the sides.

         "Ahh, that's nice... Thank you so much, Delia."

         "You're very welcome, dear." Just then, something occurred to Delia. "You know, I'm a bit surprised you asked for this. You've never taken my offers before."

         There was no immediate response. Delia, afraid to look anywhere else, stayed focused on Misty's belly.

         Finally, Misty answered, "I... Well, I wasn't sure if you were being serious or not." Embarrassment was evident in her voice. "But you did say 'Anything for me' just now, so..."

         "Sweetie, it's never my intention to tease or make fun of you. As long as you're staying under my roof, I'll tend to your every need." Delia giggled. "Not that you can't already tell by now."

         Misty giggled herself, making her body jiggle and shake a little. "Yeah, I've never felt so loved." A short silence, then she hurriedly added, "N-not that I mean that in a weird way or anything! Just, uh, y'know, you being your motherly self and all that!"

         Delia slowed for a moment. What an odd thing to say, she thought before resuming her pace. Well, no point in pushing the matter right now. Tummy rubs come first.

         A longer silence fell between them. After a while, Delia asked, "So are you trying to make room for an extra big dinner tonight?"

         "Aren't all my dinners extra big?" They shared a laugh.

         "True, but I don't think you'd be asking for a tummy rub if you didn't want to digest faster. Do you have anything special in mind for tonight?"

         "Tonight? Hmm... I-- Actually, never mind that. Do you think we could go clothes shopping? Tomorrow, I mean."

         Delia stopped and forced herself to look up at Misty's face. Those puffy cheeks were so cute, and so was that double chin...

         "Tomorrow? Er, I certainly don't see why not, but are you sure you'll be able to go out? Even my old maternity clothes are getting too small for you."

         Misty nodded, which caused her double chin to almost bunch up into a triple. "I know, that's why I want to go as soon as possible."

         "I could always just go out and get them for you, if you'd prefer."

         "Yeah, but it's been forever since I've gone out."

         "Will you be up for all that walking around?"

         Why does it feel like I want to keep her from going out? She does need the exercise, even if I am fattening her up...

         Misty looked away, her lips pursed and her brow furrowed.
14111211111.title: Testing the Waters

choices: Back at home, Misty decides to do something to pass the time.
Time passes. Delia's own weight gain begins to speed up.
141112111111.content:
She was well overdo for some time out of the house, she knew that. Even so, she couldn't find it in her to get excited about the idea.

         I'd rather just eat...

         It was second nature to her now. Eat, sleep, eat, bathroom break, eat, shower, eat. That was all she did, all she cared to do. It was simple and stress-free. No gym, no sisters, no responsibility, just food and comfort.

         It was a simple choice: Go out and face the world again? Or stay in and indulge?

         Misty turned back to Delia. "I guess I wouldn't mind staying here, if you're okay with buying stuff for me."

         Delia's face lit up. "Of course I am! I wouldn't have offered if I weren't." She tilted her head to the side. "But what happened to the part about not going out in forever?"

         Misty just shrugged and went back to massaging the sides of her big belly.

         And it'll keep getting bigger and bigger.

         The thought made her smile. What also made her smile were thoughts of tonight's dinner. No doubt it would put all her previous meals to shame, just like her last one, and the one before that. She had to commend Delia for keeping up with her appetite; a big eater like her can't be easy to satisfy.

         "You sure look happy."

         The sudden statement yanked Misty from her thoughts. She looked down at Delia, who was grinning at her.

         "Just enjoying myself," Misty responded. She tried digging her fingers into her gut. It had the tiniest hint of give. How long had they been rubbing?

         "That's good." Delia returned her attention to her massage. Man, she sure knew her way around a packed stomach.

         The two fell silent once more. Without anything to focus on, Misty found herself growing a little drowsy. A full tummy, a warm and fuzzy robe, even a nice massage... Yup, she was officially in paradise. Who needed strenuous work like running a gym or exercising? Workaholics, maybe. But Misty was no such thing, at least not anymore. This simpler, decadent lifestyle worked just fine.

         Yeah, I'm a glutton. A pig, a cow, a whale... I'm all of that. Why should I go back to my old life when I have everything I need now? I'm gonna stay right here. Right here, with Delia...

         As she dozed off, Misty's lips curled into a dimpled smile only true happiness could make.

------

         Plus-size clothes shopping wasn't exactly something Delia did often. Aside from her maternity clothes, she couldn't remember ever needing anything larger than the average sizes. It was hard enough considering that. It was even harder considering she was shopping on someone else's behalf. Not to mention she didn't know what size Misty was by now.

         Delia sighed and scanned the store for anything that looked vaguely big enough. Sizing ran on different metrics when it came to plus-size, right? Like, a large here was bigger than a large elsewhere. (Probably more expensive, too...)

         Then again, what was the point in searching by size? She hadn't bothered with measuring Misty. Too much work. Plus, there was the matter of her nonstop growing. Even after forgoing the special powder for the last couple meals--not that it was noticeable, thanks to its tasteless nature--Delia could still see Misty filled out some more between yesterday afternoon and this morning. Buying something that fit snugly today would be rendered obsolete within a day or two. Possibly even sooner.

         Even that nice bathrobe I just got her...

         Delia shook her head. It was her own fault. She was the one who essentially persuaded Misty to adopt a sedentary, ultra-fattening lifestyle. And how could Delia break her out of it when it was an absolute joy to indulge her? Ignoring how deliciously hefty she was getting, it felt so good to have someone to dote on. Not to mention, every last adorably dimpled smile and all the constant appreciation way more than made up for all the cooking Delia had to do (not that she minded any of that in the first place).

         Humming thoughtfully to herself, she lightly tugged the hemline of her shirt. Definitely tighter than it used to be. She would probably be able to fit her maternity clothes again before too much longer. Another couple weeks at most, even less if she started giving herself more of the powder. Considering she didn't plan on giving any of it to Misty anymore, that probably wasn't too bad an idea. Maybe she'd enjoy being fat too.

Well, I'm already on my way there, she thought with a lopsided smile. A rack of comfy-looking shirts caught her eye, and she walked over to them. Upon closer inspection, she noticed none of them would fit over Misty's enormous belly. A shiver ran up her spine.
141112111111.title: Since You Offered...

choices: ...was down by about a quarter of what it had before!
1411121111111.content:
Boredom.

         Nothing else could make a day drag quite like boredom. Seconds felt like minutes, minutes like hours, and so on. One could have all the time in the world, but it wouldn't mean much if they had nothing to do. Especially bad was the kind of boredom that left its victim too apathetic to do anything about it.

         On the other hand, the right amount of boredom made for an excellent motivational tool. Like, for example, driving an obese Misty to get off the couch.

         Delia left at some point during breakfast. That meant nobody was around to help Misty get up. Even so, she pushed down on the couch--one hand on the adjacent seat, the other on the armrest--and pushed her gut forwards as she attempted to lift herself off. Not much luck there. So instead, she gripped the edges and pulled while trying to scoot her way off. Fat jiggled and jostled with each jerk. Discomfort joined the contents of her stomach, but she grit her teeth and ignored it. Once she felt ready, she pushed down and lifted her massive body onto her legs. She almost fell into the coffee table. Thankfully, her balance held, and she let out a sigh of relief.

         Sweat had accumulated on her brow, and her cheeks were a bit flushed. What was once a simple action now took considerable effort. She chuckled at this realization.

         "Can't say I'm surprised." She pat her belly. "Now what was I-- Oh yeah, the backyard."

         As Misty waddled to the back door, she took note of how her body shook with each step. It was always on the back of her mind, but it wasn't as noticeable back when she was first fattening up a mere week ago.

         Has it really only been a week? She thought as she turned to her side to open the door; her belly was getting in the way. The thought left her mind the moment the sunlight hit her. So warm and inviting. Why did she choose to stay inside and have Delia do the shopping again?

         Oh, right. Laziness.

         Misty opened her bathrobe and cooed. The sun always felt amazing on her skin, and it felt even more so with all the extra skin she'd gained. The fact she hadn't gone outside in days helped, too. Smiling, she looked down at her bulbous belly and rubbed it affectionately.

         "I'm hopelessly obsessed with you, aren't I?" she asked it. "But I guess that's the idea. A glutton's supposed to obsess over their belly. Keep it stuffed, massage it, make it big..."She blushed. "But you're not just big, are you? No, you're huge. I've never seen a belly as huge as you. In fact, I bet you're one of the biggest bellies in the world. People could pig out for months, and they still wouldn't compare. They'd never be able to grow as fast or as big and round as you."

         She sighed and shook her head. Despite that, she was still grinning. "Just listen to me. I'm so obsessed with my own belly. Oh, Delia, what have you done to me?" She giggled. "But I guess I can't blame her too much. I'm not even trying to escape this!"

         Another giggle, and she gave her gut a pat. "But how can I? It just feels so good..."

         Her constant craving for food asserted its presence. Licking her lips, she re-knotted her robe and waddled back inside. Then she waddled to the kitchen. With no hankering for anything in particular, she perused the shelves and cabinets. Everything looked good. She could eat everything clean with ease. The thought of frustrating Delia with an emergency grocery trip, however, shot down that idea. Misty reached for another cabinet.

         "I'll just settle for the next thing I..."

         It was Delia's collection of seasonings and spices. Those weren't what derailed her train of thought. What did derail it was a familiar-looking dispenser.

         "Is this...?" Misty pulled it out. The dispenser didn't look any different from any of the others, but the purple color stood out. Plus, it looked more like a powder. "I'm pretty sure I saw Delia using this once. And I think one of my meals looked a bit purple-y..."

         A thought occurred. Misty moved over to the fridge and opened the freezer. Two containers of strawberry ice cream caught her eye. She grinned and scooped them up in her arm, shivering at their coldness. It was time for a little testing.

------

         Delia sighed upon walking through the door. In her hands were two large shopping bags.

         "I'd heard plus-size was expensive, but that still wasn't as bad as I thought," she mused to herself, all smiles. "But I suppose it wouldn't have mattered either way. As long as Misty's happy with them, then it's all fine."

         Part of her wanted to make a grocery trip before returning, but she simply couldn't find the heart to leave Misty alone for so long. The poor dear had no one else for company, not to mention food. Sure, she could always fix up something herself, but pampering her was just so much fun! Of course, that would inevitably lead to her growing into a giant blob of a young lady who didn't even remember what fresh air felt like.

         Maybe she should get out more...

         Delia shook her head. She could worry about that after dealing with Misty's clothing situation. Heading to the living room, Delia's eyes sparkled when she saw Misty in her usual spot and rubbing her belly. A moment was needed for Delia to make sure her legs wouldn't give out.

         "I'm back!" she declared upon her approach. Misty turned to her and smiled brightly. Those dimpled cheeks kept getting cuter by the day. Oh, how nice it would be to caress them...

         "Hey, Delia," Misty said, "sorry I didn't notice you leave."

         "I understand. You were too busy with your meal."

         Misty blushed and looked down at her belly, which she rubbed a little harder. "Yeah, sorry..."

         "Oh, don't worry about it!" Delia waved her free hand dismissively. "The last thing I'd want is to get in the way of anyone's appetite, especially one like yours!"

         Both Misty's blushing and rubbing intensified. Stifling a giggle, Delia's gaze drifted to the coffee table. Two empty containers of strawberry ice cream sat there, along with a spoon and--

         She stiffened. Her blood ran cold. In between the ice cream containers was her weight gain powder. The dispenser...
1411121111111.title: Stretching Those Big Ol' Legs

14111211111112.content:
"I hope you don’t mind, but I wanted to try this stuff out,” Misty admitted, a tone of mischievous guilt was underlying her voice. She held up the canister. “I’m not sure why you use it so much. It took loads to taste any difference at all, and even then it was hard to make out...”

         The contents of the container had been mixed into Misty’s “light snack” in her effort to discover the effects. Delia feared the possibility of the young redhead discovering the fattening agent from the moment of it’s purchase; any indications of the powder’s true intent had been removed with it’s label.

         To Misty, it didn’t seem like the powder had any effects on her meal aside from giving it a hint of flavoring.

         One of the main marketable features of ‘GainX’ (the Brand Name produced by Hypno Brothers Inc.) was it’s lack of flavor. The dosage Misty used however, gave the ice cream a slight tinge of Tamato Berries, barely perceivable unless someone was looking for it.

         Consumption of the purple particles causes one’s metabolism to plummet, while also acting as an appetite stimulant. In extended use, it’s shown to slowly cause the user’s physical motivation to slowly decline. Along with her newfound inner glutton, GainX was one of the root causes of Misty’s tireless desire to stuff herself silly, and her accepting attitude towards utter laziness.

         Misty stifled a small burp and rubbed her belly. With a quarter of the dispenser’s contents digesting in her stomach, it would only be a matter of time before it took full effect.

         Delia’s eyes drifted from the container to Misty’s growing midriff. She was going to need a small feast ready.

------

         Delia prepared to respond, taking care to choose her next words wisely.

         She was left in a dilemma. On one hand, the homely (...and rather plump as of late…) woman felt like she should tell the truth; about the powder, about the restaurant—about everything. Even though she’d stopped using the supplement for a few days, she still felt responsible for everything, as if she were taking advantage of the young gym leader. ‘I can’t keep going on like this,’ Delia thought to herself. Admitting what she did would surely be the end of the trust she’d built with Misty.

         On the other hand, she could simply keep Misty in the dark about her perverted sentiment. As they say, ignorance is bliss, no? And besides, it seemed like the young redhead might actually be enjoying her lavish pampering. Delia couldn’t shrug the looming sense that she was responsible for that.

         After a minute of deliberate thought, Delia made up her mind.

         “Well sweetie... this here powder is for growing girls like you!” she said in a motherly manner. She sat next to Misty, poking at her doughy midsection and smiling.

         A giggle escaped from the “growing girl.” She was clearly ticklish.

         “Hey!” Misty yelled, giggling between her words. “Cut that out!” A smile grew across her face, as her cheeks blushed deep red. “Well, I supposed I’d been meaning to talk about that…”

         “Is something wrong?” Delia asked. Her face changed from a playful demeanor to a more serious one. “It’s okay if you want me to stop feeding you so much. You’ve really put on weight, and I can’t help but feel responsible for it.” Delia pinched at Misty’s fat, shaking it lightly.

         This only seemed to make Misty’s giggle erupt into laughter, due not only to her ticklish nature, but she thought that was a ridiculous proposal.

         “Don’t be so silly! I’m having one of the best times of my life! I have all I can eat almost whenever I want, and no responsibilities to think of. As for the weight, I came to embrace it as part of the package. If anything, I feel like I’ve been taking advantage of your incredible hospitality.” Misty looked away. “You’ve really been doing a lot for me—I don’t want to be too much work for you...”

         “No!” Delia shouted “I uh- I mean taking care of you is no trouble at all sweetheart.” Her tone shifted into heartfelt sincerity. “I love spending time with you as well; taking care of you has given me something to do now with Ash gone. Besides, a pretty young thing like you needs to eat!” Delia prodded the corpulent mass once more.

         “I guess I’m helping your restaurant too, aren’t I?” Misty interjected. “At this rate you’ll be the best chef in Kanto with all the practice you’re getting in.”

         Delia paused. “Yea... The restaurant… Well anyways, I’m off to go make you dinner. Anything in particular you wanted?”

         Misty’s face light up. “Maybe some pizza?”

         “Of course dear! I’ll grab a few bags of chips for you to snack on. You might have to wait a bit.”
14111211111112.title: A sigh of relief! (Sorta)

choices: ...she should keep her in the dark,
141112111111121.content:
An hour of cooking and snacking ensued. It was only a matter of time before the powder took full effect. The motherly figure took care to prepare one of the largest platters she’d made yet. A rack three levels in height carried a large pizza atop each row. Adorned with copious amounts of pepperoni, bacon, sausage, ham, and extra cheese, it was practically dripping with grease.

         To the side, a plate was filled with upwards of thirty boneless wings, (we can’t have our growing protagonist choke to death on the bones, can we?), each one deep fried and breaded rather than the traditional method of preparation. Beside them stood a stack of twenty thickly cut onion rings.

         For dessert, Delia prepared the richest chocolate cake she was capable of creating. It towered over the plate it sat upon being four layers high. The exterior of the cake was lathered in rich frosting - also chocolate.

------

         “It feels like I haven’t eaten in days!”

         Delia placed the meal before Misty. “Enjoy sweetheart!”

         Without any further comments, Misty began with one of the pizzas. Possessed by her hunger, she found it increasingly difficult to eat in a civilized manner. She began grabbing two slices at once, grease dripping down her hands as she devoured the conglomeration of meat and cheese. Her manners only deteriorated from there. After finishing the first platter, she fully submitted to her hunger, devouring the meal as a starving animal would. She no longer took an effort in distinguishing individual slices, grabbing as much pizza as her hands would allow.

         Minutes passed. Delia looked on in astonishment. Never before had she seen someone so consumed by their hunger like Misty was now. The young redhead only showed any signs of slowing down after finishing the third pizza. As the rotund mother watched, a thought appeared.

         Delia sat on the sofa beside Misty. Though brand new, the white t-shirt the young girl wore was already beginning to rise up her paunch. Her top was covered in shrapnel from the battle that was developing—drips of grease and cheese adorned her breasts, which could only be considered larger than average despite her considerable increase in weight.

         Delia placed a hand on Misty’s belly, under the shirt where her belly was peeking out. She raised her hand, and along with it, the hemline of the messy tee. She stopped just before the breasts, and began rubbing her belly in a slow circular motion, all the while Misty was completely unaware, enamored by her food-driven trance.

         Delia began by picking up an onion ring, waving it in front of Misty’s lips. Unaware of what was going on around her, the redhead opened her mouth and allowed the greasy morsel entry. This was obviously not enough for the young girl, as she kept grabbing food by the handful on her own accord. A change of pace was necessary if Delia wanted to continue.

         Delia brought the remaining food closer to Misty, as she shifted her own bodyweight up and over, resting her own legs onto Misty’s bare thickening thighs. (She wore only her panties while her new sweatpants were in the wash). From this position Delia could put keep up with Misty’s pace, helping finish off the onion rings within a matter of seconds. Misty no longer reached out for food, allowing Delia to feed her as she sat back. With the onion rings polished off, she began popping wings into the redhead’s mouth by the handful.

         Minutes passed by. Misty submitted to gluttony, consuming the chunks of fried meat as they were presented. Without entirely noticing, Delia subconsciously snacked on some of the wings as well. Her hand reached for the plate one final time only to grab at air. She quickly realized they’d finished the last of the food on the platter. She lifted her body off of Misty’s lap, giving her bulging belly a pat and her round cheeks a pinch. Misty was definitely beginning to feel full, but felt she had some room left over—a rarity to her since she’d first arrived.

         “Don’t you worry sweetie, I’ll be back in just a moment. Ready for dessert?”

         As if she’d uttered a command word, the obese girl snapped out of her trance and turned to Delia with an expression of utter glee. “Yes please Miss Ket- er… Delia!”

         Delia returned and set down the gargantuan cake before the hungry teen. “Eat up!” she said, massaging Misty's shoulders.

         Misty shifted her weight forwards, grabbing chunks of the cake with her bare hands and cramming them between her impatient lips. She bit down into the cake, moaning softly from it’s luscious flavor. Never before had she eaten something as succulent as the confection before her. Her expansive front became a battleground, decorated with messy wads of chocolate. Layer after layer of cake entered her gut until several minutes later, when the cake had been finished.

         The fight was over with Misty reigning victorious. Exhausted and more full than she thought possible, the gorged young woman relaxed, leaning back against her ample rear. Delia perched next to the young woman and began wiping up the remaining mess with a free hand, feeding the young redhead the remnants of the meal. With her other hand she massaged the distended mass they called Misty’s stomach.

         Ten minutes passed until Delia finished. She got up from the sofa and cleaned up the aftermath of Misty’s meal. She placed a plate of freshly baked cookies beside the hefty girl and turned the TV to some mindless entertainment to keep Misty occupied.

         Delia noticed something peculiar. Misty appeared oblivious to her current messy state. Even though she had cleaned most of the larger chunks of food from her waist, there were still smears of grease and chocolate littered all over her blubbery form.
