The television had her attention, but any information it would have presented her seemed to bounce off her glassy stare.

------

         From Misty’s perspective, the night was wholly centered around her needy hunger and stuffing herself until she’d finished. She had no recollection of Delia’s involvement, when she was hand-fed heaps of succulent morsels. No memory of her stomach being covered in food, only to be reinserted into her mouth. No recollection of Delia’s weight upon her lap, or the massaging she received. She only remembered that she was hungry, that she was eating, and that her pained stomach was being soothed.

         Misty’s foggy mind couldn’t conceive anything else during the trance-like state she frequently entered. Only then, her mind remained that way far beyond the duration of her meal. It wasn’t until eleven o'clock that she retained any capacity to think beyond her stomach. Her weight heaved forwards and up, lifting her bloated mass onto two thick legs. She felt an external force guide her towards Ash’s old room and into the bathroom.

         It was like she snapped out of a spell. Her mind was finally back, as she looked around. Misty saw herself in the mirror and smiled a little. Her messy shirt still rolled up to her breasts, revealing her gargantuan stomach.

         “Oof… I haven’t felt stuffed like this since I first came here…” she quietly said to herself. Her eyes scanned up and down her body, taking note of the mess that remained. “Looks like you really put up a fight, huh?” she said to her belly, smiling and giggling. “If I’m going to be a complete glutton, I might want to be decent about it next time…” she thought.

         After a much needed shower, Misty stepped into one of her new (and much larger) bathrobes. She was about to step out when her eye caught something in the corner of the room.

         A scale.

         Curious to put a number to change in weight over the past few days, she decided to step up. “Wow, I hadn’t expected this to be so exhilarating...” she silently thought to herself. Misty had developed a somewhat nurturing attachment to her growing body, and had no reason to stop.

         The numbers on the scaled whirred up. And down. And back up again. When it finally came to a rest, it read 302 lbs. Where most girls would have felt a sense of terror and panic, Misty almost felt a sense of pride. Looking back on what Delia said, maybe it was okay to just let go of all her responsibilities and embrace this lifestyle after all. They were both having the time of their lives, and it didn’t seem like either party was ready to stop now.

         A warm smile grew as her mind was filled with food and relaxation. Another thought crossed her mind… The powder.

------

         Delia was relaxing at the kitchen table, (though she seldom used it to eat at anymore). She was clothed in her bathrobe as well, with a mug of coffee in her hand and a book in front of her titled Cookies, Cakes, and Eclaires: A Collection of Home-Baked Recipes. She looked up from her book to see Misty in the kitchen door. “Wow, she moves quiet for her size…”

         “Hey Delia, I just wanted to thank you for the meal tonight. It was probably the best one you’ve made yet.”

         “Oh it was no trouble dear!” Delia smiled back. “You looked like you were really enjoying yourself.”

         “I just had a question for you…”

         “Ask away dear, anything you want to know.” Delia grew slightly concerned regarding Misty’s request.

         Misty leaned against the door frame. “I think I remember you saying something about the powder earlier…” Her eyes drifted, attempting to recall her exact words. “Something like ‘for growing girls like me?’ What did you mean by that?”

         There was no escaping it this time. Delia had to answer. A moment passed and she decided...
141112111111121.title: Time for Dinner!

1411121111111211.content:
Delia couldn’t do it anymore. She’d been dishonest with herself and Misty for far too long. Whatever the consequences, she knew deep down that she probably deserved what was coming her way.

“Well sweetie, I suppose I should tell you the truth,” Delia began, her throat bundled into knots. “The powder is a gaining supplement.” Delia briefed the gym leader on what it did, trying to use use complex medical jargon in hopes that Misty’s understanding was hampered.

“So you’re telling me... this stuff has been making me fatter?”

“In layman’s terms, yes.”

The obese redhead looked down to her distended gut. Her mind was running at no less than a million miles per hour. She had been stuffing herself to the point of nearly bursting virtually every day for almost… How long had she been there now? After quickly glancing at the calendar stuck to the fridge, Misty had her answer. ’Two and a half weeks??’ She could hardly believe her eyes. Misty had lost herself to her own gluttonous stupor nearly every day.

It was a state of pure bliss for the corpulent teen. Abundant meals every day, next to no responsibilities whatsoever, and a caring mother figure. Even though she had been intentionally fattened, it wasn’t as if she minded the new weight. In fact, she sometimes found herself playing with her expanding flesh in private, watching her blubber jiggle around, conforming softly to her thick hands.

Misty opened her mouth, preparing to talk.
1411121111111211.title: Knowledge is Power

choices: Misty didn't forget. She's just putting things off until tomorrow.
Misty did forget. The massive dose of powder affected her quite a bit.
Misty has a strange dream, one that helps sort out her feelings.
14111211111112113.content:
When Misty finally opened her mouth, Delia braced herself for the worst...

         But Misty didn't say anything. Her stare shifted to the kitchen table, and then it...grew a bit unfocused?

         "Are you gonna finish those?"

         Delia blinked. "What?"

         "The marshmallows. Are you gonna finish them?"

         "Marsh...mallows...?" Delia followed Misty's gaze and nearly did a double take.

         Next to her book and coffee was a bag of mini marshmallows, opened and roughly a quarter empty. A bag she didn't even remember taking out of the pantry, letting alone eating from. When did she do that? Did she do that? She checked her breath. Apparently, she did.

         "Uh, no," she said, turning back to Misty. "Why, do you want them?"

         "Uh-huh!" Misty smiled. Her eyes glazed over a little more.

         Trying not to look too dumbstruck, Delia handed the bag to Misty, who wasted no time tearing into it.

         The remaining mini marshmallows couldn't have lasted more than a minute, if even that. Misty devoured them handful by massive handful, barely stopping to finish one before continuing on to the next. Not a single one was spared from her gluttony. Her rounded cheeks puffed up even bigger. She filled the kitchen with her audible chewing and occasional moans. And her eyes were, as always, hazy with food lust.

         Misty fell silent as she finished the last of the marshmallows. Her gaze remained distant, as though her mind hadn't yet caught up with the rest of her. Her free hand stroked her gut. A small smile dimpled her cheeks.

         Delia would have smiled too, but given the current situation...

         She cleared her throat. "Misty?" It was almost a whisper, as though she were afraid to break Misty's zen-like state.

         Misty blinked a few times, clarity returning to her eyes. Upon regaining her awareness, she looked at Delia and smiled wider. "Thanks, Delia! That hit the spot!" She patted her belly for emphasis.

         Delia said nothing. She just stared at Misty with a look that just barely hid her bafflement. How was she supposed to react here? She basically confessed to fattening Misty up and the girl responds by eating a bag of mini marshmallows? What kind of reaction was that?! Was it her way of saying she was fine with it? Or had her gluttony grown so much that the mere sight of food cut off all other thoughts? Granted, the latter was a pretty sexy prospect...

         "Oh, you're welcome, dear," she said, forcing a smile. "Though I'm surprised you even wanted anything after such a big dinner."

         "So am I, honestly." Misty laughed as she set the empty bag on the kitchen table. "I just suddenly felt like having a midnight snack. Plus, it's kind of fun to see how much I can pack away." She smacked her gut with both hands, sending a slight ripple through her body.

         "Really..." Delia eyed that gut, lingered a bit, looked back up at Misty.

         "Yup." Misty's face then lit up. "Oh! By the way, guess what! I weighed myself earlier, and I've officially broken 300 pounds!"

         300...

         In a mere two and a half weeks...

         300 pounds...

         300 big, heavy, sexy pounds...

         Suddenly, Misty looked even bigger. Every last curve and fat fold looked all the more pronounced and luscious. Her new bathrobe seemed even more form fitting, nearly skin tight. The look of pride on her face almost literally shone with radiance. And her belly--that beautiful, magnificent orb of perfection--all but begged to be worshiped and praised. In that moment, Misty was no mere fat girl, but a goddess of gluttonous beauty.

         Were Delia a weaker woman, she'd have tackled Misty to the ground and ravaged her with love all night long.

         "Goodness" was she could say. The awe in her tone was clear as day.

         Misty's grin widened even further. "Yeah, I was pretty impressed myself. You think I could make it to 350 by the end of the week?"

         Dear Arceus above, girl, are you doing this to me on purpose?!

         "Well," Delia stammered, "try not to gain too fast. I just bought you new clothes, after all."

         "Oh, right. Sorry." Misty grinned sheepishly and scratched her gut. "It's just, you know, you said I look good like this the other day, so..." She forced a giggle.

         "That I did." Delia giggled as well. Oh good, her nerves were finally starting to settle down.

         Another giggle from Misty, then she fell silent. Her expression turned thoughtful. "Um... We were talking about something before my snack, right? What was it again?"

         Delia stiffened. The knots in her throats returned with a vengeance. She opened her mouth--

         "Oh yeah, I was just thanking you for dinner." Misty smiled. "I can't wait to see how you top this one."

         All the tension drained out of Delia. It took her a second to reply. "I'm not sure I can, but I'll certainly try."

         "You can do it. I believe in you." The smile Misty flashed made Delia's heart flutter. "Well, I better get to bed. Good night, and thanks again for the snack."

         "Good night, dear. See you in the morning."

         Delia watched Misty waddle out of the kitchen, her eyes drawn to the growing girl's butt. So big and fat and jiggly...

         She shook her head. Then she sighed.

         What just happened? Misty didn't really just up and forget the whole powder thing, did she? No, surely not. A mere bag of mini marshmallows couldn't possibly be enough to make her forget the whole thing, especially one only three-quarters full. Besides, she could easily scarf down two full bags no problem.

         But speaking of marshmallow bags, why couldn't Delia remember breaking one out for a snack? Sure, she'd put on some weight the last couple of weeks, and yes, she took some of the powder, but nowhere near enough to become a slave to her own appetite.

         ... Right?

         She sighed again. "Well, a few extra pounds won't hurt. Even getting myself up to Misty's size won't make up for what I've done but..."

         Yet another sigh, and she got up and headed for the pantry. There was another bag of mini marshmallows and she suddenly felt like having a snack.
14111211111112113.title: Judgment is...Postponed?

141112111111121131.content:
Mmm… *Crunch* *Munch*

         Factoring in how late the two had stayed up last night, Delia figured she had an extra hour or so to prepare a grand breakfast for her growing guest. The additional time was necessary if last night’s meal was anything to go by.

         *Munch* *Munch* *Gulp*

         I swear, that girl packs away food like she’s never eaten before… Even without the powder!

         *Slurp* *Crunch*

         The powder. There was a topic she’d be dancing around with a ten foot pole today, especially after yesterday’s awkward confrontation. Deciding against getting any more tangled up in the mess she’d made, she firmly decided she would no longer be using any-

         “Good morning Delia! Add any extra powder to breakfast today?”

         “Ohf! Mifty dehr!” The mother took an extra moment to chew and swallow the handful of bacon being processed in her mouth. Turning around, she saw all 300 lbs of Misty in her kitchen doorway once more, dressed in messy hair and too-tight pajamas. Why she hadn’t heard the fat teen approach was a mystery to her, though it probably had something to do with the grease currently coating her fingertips. “I didn’t think you’d be up this early! It takes quite some time to digest a meal like yesterdays,” Delia said nervously, trying as best as she could to dance around the dreaded ‘P’ word.

         A hungered groan escaped Misty’s stomach only serving to prove her otherwise. “Guess that powder must have worked even better than you thought it would. Feels like I gained ten pounds from that one meal alone!” Misty gave her belly a hearty slap. The ripples it made hypnotized Delia for a moment. “So you using any more for this growing girl?” Misty beamed.

         “Uhm… s-sure thing sweetheart!” she said, eyes still trained on the teen’s blubbery body. “Wait, I mean no- uh I mean yes! Yea hun, I’ll make sure you get plenty of it, as long as that’s what you want. You do remember our conversation from last night, right?”

         “Yup! Powder makes me fatter, right?”

         “Err, yes... That is correct…”

         “Sweet! 350, here I come!” Misty shouted as she left for the living room, plopping her heaving mass down as soon as she had the chance. Dumbfounded and left to stare into space, Delia merely sighed, rubbed her forehead, and opened the spice cupboard doors, treating herself to another slice of bacon as she rummaged through.

------

         Wake up, eat breakfast, watch TV, have some post-breakfast snacks, watch more TV, haul in a heavy lunch, take a nap, indulge in a fattening feast for dinner—followed of course by an equally large dessert—and go to bed to convert the days calories into corpulence. This pattern continued on for another five days, and as the meals grew larger, so did Misty.

         Delia noted the permanent impression left on the couch, spanning two of the three seats provided. She watched and saw Misty’s body jiggle slightly more each time she would get up from lazing about—an occurrence that grew rarer over time. In fact, Misty would sometimes choose to sleep on the living room couch rather than have to haul her bulky 370 lbs frame to bed.

         As the days went on, Misty’s “food trances” as Delia called them would grow more intense; the obese teen gave less concern for her surroundings and only seemed to focus on eating as much as possible.

         *UUURRRRRRRP!*

         “Oooof…” Misty sighed and rubbed her belly, surprisingly satisfied with today’s post-breakfast “snack”. Beside her was an emptied quart of chocolate milk and a plate which once held a baker’s dozen of freshly fried donuts, now reduced to sugary residue. Adorning her bulkier body was the pajamas from several nights ago, now stained by chocolate, grease, and a variety of other miscellaneous foodstuffs.

         “Finished already sweetums?” Misty grunted and stared idly at the television screen. Before she could register what was happening, the sweet taste of cookies tapped along her tongue as Delia fed the pampered princess. “Good thing I made a little something extra. You’d be starving by lunch time otherwise!” Misty forcefully grabbed the plate and dug in.

         Seeing that Misty was enjoying herself, Delia walked waddled back to the kitchen, eager to start work on the next meal, (and to get back to her own plate of cookies).

         “A-lrighty, so… Looks like this recipe calls for 1 lbs of butter? Huh, no cups, tablespoons or anything like that?” Delia thought out loud to herself. A little while of rummaging through her kitchen revealed she had no scale. “Huh, guess I’ll just have to improvise…”

         She returned with the bathroom scale, eager to get back to her cooking. “Annnnd perfect! 1 lbs of butter exactly.” ’I wonder how much of that will convert into fat… not that she’s the only one getting bigger around here…’ At that thought she looked down at her own pudgy form. ’I haven’t gotten that big though… have I?’

         Out of curiosity, she set the scale on the ground and stepped on it. She waited and watched the numbers slowly bounce up and down, eventually stopping at…
141112111111121131.title: Misty didn't forget. She's just putting...

1411121111111211311.content:
The scale read 247… Only 3 pounds away from 250.

         A shiver ran through her body.

         It was as if Delia’s eyes had been opened for the first time in days as she looked down at her own pudgy form, noticing how her shirt clung tightly to the rolls of the belly peeking out from underneath. Further down was her admittedly large lower half, thighs ever thunderous and an ass that spilled out of her sorely undersized sweatpants.

         ’By Arceus, I’ve gotten big!’ She took the moment to feel out her own body, lifting and dropping her belly as well as grasping her ballooning rear. ’This powder might be stronger than I thought! I’ve only been snacking and sampling Misty’s food and I’m 3 pounds away from 250!?' Needless to say, “snacking” to Misty would be considered a three course meal by anyone else; the girl’s appetite seemed to be rubbing off on her.

         *UURRRRRP!!*

         *sigh* ‘No point fretting over it now, sounds like Misty’s ready for more…’ The plump mother waddled out with a plate of cupcakes in one hand, a milkshake in the other, and a loving smile across her face. After setting them down beside the massive redhead, she happily took a few cupcakes for herself, seemingly oblivious to her previous revelation.

         ------

         ‘More food…’

         *Munch* *Smack*

         ‘Mmmm, cupcakes? Tasty…’

         *Slurrp*

         ‘Mmm… Vanilla… So thick… I love milkshakes.’

         *Munch* *Chomp*

         ‘Fried slowpoke tail?? Mmm… so greasy and fatty…’

         ‘Oooh… Cookies? Delicious…’

         ‘It’s all so good...'

         '...so fattening…’

         ‘Mmmm… Fat…'

         Misty rubbed her enormous belly as she glutted herself throughout the day, feeling the doughy fat squished between her fingers. She moaned softly in satisfaction during every meal, blissfully unaware of anything else around her. The fog-like trance had been ongoing since the beginning of the week, not having much time or ability to think of anything outside of being fed and getting fatter. Delia’s pampering only served to push the girl deeper into gluttonous paradise.

         ------

         What happens next?

1) Delia decides Misty’s too much to handle alone: She needs help from her Pokemon!

2) Another one of Ash’s lady friends receives an invitation from Delia to visit Pallet town. Who was invited? Are they there to help, or will they too be victims of a pampering paradise?

3) As she continues to grow heavier, lazier, and hazier, Misty grows into a fat slob. Delia continues to stuff the girl silly, but can she save herself from the same fate?

         ------
1411121111111211311.title: Weighty Revelations

14111211111112113112.content:
Delia licked and sealed the envelope of her handwritten letter before stepping outside, shielding her eyes from the intense sunlight as she did so. This was her first time leaving the house in days, no, weeks? She couldn’t quite remember. There was no need to go out and buy groceries nowadays since everything could be ordered from home, a convenience she’d been swearing by ever since her wardrobe started to reveal far more skin than acceptable.

         The cool autumn air was deflected by her protective layer of blubber, which quivered with each thigh-rubbing step.

         *Huff* *Puff* “Alright Delia, you’ve-” *Pant* “... you’ve got this! Just… just a...” *Wheeze* “Little… further…” She stood dead in her tracks, bending towards the ground and panting heavily. “Just a little break is all…” After a moment of recuperation, she looked back up to see that she was only a third of the way towards her destination. The obscenities Misty would have heard were obscured by the sound of the girl’s own voracious appetite at work. “You’ve got to be kidding me…” Delia sighed, only to heave her huge body back into motion.

         After what felt like an eternity of punishment, Delia found herself stood in front of the mailbox, filled to the brim with letters she had been too lazy to get beforehand. She swapped out the stack of envelopes for only one, lowering the flag of the mailbox as she did so. Turning around, she slowly realized she would once again have to traverse all the way back to her front door. She instead plopped her fattened rear onto the soft grass beneath her, deciding a quick break was in place before she was ready to traverse the fifty foot trek once more.

         ------

         One Week Later...

         It was mid afternoon, meaning Misty was enjoying her aptly named “Second Post-Lunch Snack.” Life without stress was being well enjoyed by the obese teen, not a single care in the world except for how much she could pack into her gluttonous gut, and as a side effect, how fat she was becoming. She still held some issues of mental clarity while eating to her heart’s content—which was what she spent most of her time doing anyhow—but was well aware of her surroundings afterwards, often complimenting Delia’s cooking, or making note of how much fatter she’d been getting. Delia appreciated both gestures, but practically drooled over the latter.

         Few things could snap the corpulent cutie out of her trance-like consumption of food. It was all so good! The sticky-sweet flavor of whipped cream piled atop mounds of chocolatey brownies, the warmth of it as it entered her mouth, still fresh... The indescribable feeling of fattening treats travel down her throat, converting into cushy corpulence as it traversed through her body... The feeling of being so stuffed that she couldn’t eat another bite, and moving on to her next snack… It was all so intoxicating her. So fattening. She couldn’t help feeling pleasure sweep through her body. Just imagining how big she could be… It was all so flusteri-

         *DING* *DONG*

         Misty’s eyes snapped up from her meal and looked to the doorway. “Coming…!” Delia shouted as she tried putting on something presentable. From the kitchen, the motherly woman waddled her way towards the door.

         She opened the door, but the identity of the visitor was obscured by the sunlight outside. “Come in dear, please! Make yourself at home!” Misty then recognized who this mystery visitor was!

         It’s…
14111211111112113112.title: Fun for Everyone!

choices: What about the Girls from Unova?
Who said they had to be young?
141112111111121131123.title: More Options!

choices: It's Nurse Joy, here to help care for the two!
1411121111111211311233.content: Well then, who's it going to be?
1411121111111211311233.title: Who said they had to be young?

choices: Joy feeds one of them a bit extra
14111211111112113112331.content:
“Please please! Come on in! It’s getting quite cold out this time of year, and you’re looking rather thin lately.” Delia stepped aside to let the mystery guest through.

         Stepping through the doorway was a the pink-haired altruist everyone knows and loves, (or one of them at least). “Hey Nurse Joy! What are you doing here?”

         “Misty dear! You look so lovely!” The svelte young woman beamed with, well… joy! She dashed over and gave the doughy girl a loving hug, grabbing a handful of back fat causing Misty to blush. “I haven’t seen you in so long! Delia sent me an invitation to stay with the two of you, so I’ll be around to help with anything you need, so don’t be afraid to ask sweetheart!” she explained, pinching the chub of Misty’s cheeks.

         Delia placed a platter of chocolate eclairs next to what was left of Misty’s other snack. “Whenever you’re ready let’s head over to the kitchen Joy, I’ve got some recipes to teach you.”

         ’This is gonna be great...’ Misty though with a relaxed smile.

         ------

         “Alright…” *Huff* *Puff* “So that’s how…” Delia paused to catch her breath. “That’s how I usually make the onion rings… The book of recipes is right here, and if you have any more questions feel free to ask.” A pudgy hand wiped the sweat from her brow. “Now let’s get started on Dinner. You can help along if you feel like you’re ready to-”

         “Actually I think have things under control.” A sigh of relief escaped Delia’s lips. “Feel free to rest up while I get dinner ready. If there’s anything you guys need, go ahead and ask dearie!”

         “Don’t have to tell me twice...” Delia moved as fast as her heavenly hips would allow into the living room, plopping down and squishing her own obese form next to Misty’s.

         A mere half hour later, Nurse Joy reemerged with a couple of two-storied serving trays, each one holding an abundantly fattening feast for each person. “Enjoy girls!” she beamed, eyes glued to their expanding waistlines.

         Misty and Delia practically leapt into their meals, gobbling down the greasy goodness with reckless abandon. Joy just sat back and smiled, occasionally having to place things within reach of the two gluttons. As the last of their platters were emptied, the two belched in unison. The feeling of being stuffed to the brim left them in a state of bliss.

         “Sounds like someone’s ready for dessert!” Joy cheered. Rather than the typical feeling of excitement that goes with such a meal, the two instead groaned in pain. She wheeled out another tray filled with desserts ranging from towering cakes to berry-filled pies only to find neither one ready. “So we’re gonna have to do it the hard way then, eh?” A slice of cake dripping in chocolate was shoved past Misty’s lips, and a piece of pie into Delias. Their eyes widened and any feelings of being full were pushed by the wayside.

         ‘That’s right my piggies… eat up… enjoy… ’

         ------

         “Enjoying your meals girls?” Joy inquired with a playful lilt.

         “Ash ahlweysh!” Delia muttered between mouthfuls of food.

         A week in to Nurse Joy’s duty left the two stuffed to their gills nearly 24/7. Resulting was a much larger Delia and a MUCH larger Misty. Having not gotten up since planting her rear down one week ago, Delia and Misty’s fat began to overlap. The overflow of Delia’s rear was cradled by Misty’s blubbery love handles and belly.

         Standing back and admiring her work, Joy estimated that she’d raised the girls’ weights by almost 100 lbs each. That meant Delia now clocked in at around 400 lbs and Misty must be past 550 lbs, nearing the big six-oh-oh...
14111211111112113112331.title: Joy Joins the Fun!

14111211111112113113.content:
As time went on, Delia noticed slight behavioral changes emerge from the redhead. The animalistic eating she’d witnessed the night of the “incident” slowly crept back into her normal eating habits, with silverware being placed by the wayside. Resulting was a body covered in delectable debris.

         Caring little about the mess resulted in grease and food stains scattered about her once pristine white tee, now more practically used as a bra. In fact, she hadn’t showered nor changed clothes all week, leaving Delia to clean up the girl’s blubbery body at the end of each day.

         Laziness had been expected, especially at a size like hers. However, Misty was reluctant to move from the couch at all by the end of the week, using it as a secondary bed.

         The loud belching wasn’t new, and the mother even learned to accept the noise as a signal of satisfaction and readiness for more, but gaseous expulsions from the opposite end had been very rare over the past month. Come to think of it, she’d only ever heard the girl’s rear twice, resulting in an embarrassed face and a thousand apologies. This week however, she’d been willing to let one loose whenever she felt without a shred of guilt, sighing happily at the release of pent up pressure.

         All in all, Misty no longer had concerns for anything that didn’t involve sating her restless appetite, more than willing to live out life as a gluttonous slob.

         After all, what was there to worry about? She had as much food as she could want, whenever she wanted it, and someone to dote on her every waking need. She had no worry over her weight, instead wanting to get even fatter. For the few moments she did have mental clarity, there was 24 hour entertainment in the form of Television before her. What more could she want? If life was truly a box of chocolates, Misty would probably be eating it.

         What Delia didn’t seem to notice however, were her own gradual changes. She would often squeeze into the open space of the couch, pressed up next to Misty’s flabby body. Rather than feed the Wailord of a girl, she sometimes opted to join in on the feasting if she felt the desire to—which was growing increasingly often—slowly succumbing to the temptations of gluttony. Sometimes, she would even sleep next to the doughy girl that she mollycoddled, nuzzling her face into the girl’s squishy body.

         She was growing apathetic towards the fact that she still wore yesterday’s clothing, that they were often stained by grease, and that they were many sizes too small. After finishing meals, she too would let out shameless belches, rubbing her stomach after a satisfactory meal. She’d grown more content with the state of things while ignoring the slight brushing sensation to either side of her hips each time she passed through a narrow doorway.

         ------

         Seven-ish days later...

         *Nom* *Chew*

         ‘Mmmm… Pizza… very greasy…’

         *Glug glug glug* *URRRRP*

         ‘That’s some good soda…’

         “Welp, time to get ready for our next meal!” Delia said, observing the stuffed state of Misty while caressing her own swollen stomach. She placed several gallons of ice cream in front of Misty to hold her off until dessert. Having reading through “Cookies, Cakes, and Eclairs” in its entirety many times, just about every recipe had been ingrained into her head, as well as a few modifications she’d made as well.

         The next hour or so was spent working on Delia and Misty’s second feast of the night while snacking on the plate of cookies she’d made earlier, occasionally cycling out the empty snacks Misty packed away. When she was finished, she wheeled out three serving carts full of desserts. A variety of cookies, cakes, and eclairs unsurprisingly took up most of the space. Plopping herself next to Misty, the two dug in with reckless abandon. While Delia at least had the courtesy to slice herself cake before cramming it in by hand, Misty took no such preliminary measures, tearing off whatever her pudgy mitts could grab. To wash it all down, the girls each had a gallon of chocolate milk. The hoggish display continued until there was no food left to grab.

         “Wow… I’m- URRRPP stuffed…” Delia groaned as she tried soothing her chocolate-covered stomach.

         Misty grunted in agreement, leaning back and cradling her massive gut before letting loose a fart.

         Delia giggled with a juvenile tone. “Eww, that’s gross” she teased before squeezing some of Misty’s abundant corpulence in her hand. When she shook it, the girl’s entire body jiggled like chocolate-speckled jello. “You’re getting really fat, aren’t you dearie?” Misty smiled and gave a soft coo. “Pretty soon it wouldn’t surprise me if someone mistook you for a Snorlax with how big you’re getting…” Delia smirked, and Misty was left flustered.

         By now, Misty had surpassed 400 lbs and was already 486 lbs, soon approaching the big 5. Delia’s body still held most of her weight in her mid and lower body, clocking in at 342 lbs already.

         Life was good.

         Let's fast forward this fattening paradise, shall we?
14111211111112113113.title: Slothful Decadence

141112111111121131131.content:
The gain slowed down significantly as the girls grew larger, but it hadn't stopped. Misty's multi-layered belly rested low between her thighs as her body sprawled out across the couch.

         A loud belch escaped from her mouth as she shovelled fistfuls of fries down her gullet, disregarding the stray one now resting between her cleavage. Delia was sat beside her, rubbing the girl’s gelatinous gut as the mother stuffed her own, giggling at Misty’s barbaric behavior.

         All seemed well on this typical day in paradise.

         From underneath the heedless gluttony, a familiar voice wriggled it’s way to fruition.

         This is it. As much food as you want, whenever you want, and you keep getting fatter and fatter. It’s the only thing that matters to you.

         Eating more and more, getting fatter and happier, both you and Delia. I doubt you could even get up, not that you’d ever want to.

         It’s so much nicer to just lay about like a pig, not even bothering to clean up after yourself.

         Misty hummed in agreement.

         No responsibilities. Not even the little ones. This is what you wanted... Isn’t it?

         Something shifted inside as the voice echoed through her mind. Isn’t it? Her eyes broke free from the television screen, glancing around as if making her first observation in weeks, like she’d broken a spell. The first thing she noticed was how tight her dilapidated clothes felt. Next, just how messy she was, covered in food residual, ...like a pig... the voice echoed again.

         Defiant, Misty leaned forwards with a furrowed brow and heaved. Even with all of her might, the thin frame beneath was not strong enough to lift the fat she’d accumulated. The only thing to come of her arduous attempt was a thundering fart that made Delia giggle.

         The bulbous mound of a girl sat back in silence.

         “I got really fat, didn’t I?”

         The mother looked on, surprised to hear something come out of Misty’s mouth besides a loud belch.

         “Wull, *munch* you shertainly hafn’t gotten *chew* any thinnur dear.” Delia paused to swallow and lick her fingers clean. “Eating like a Munchlax is bound to add a bit of blubber!” She jiggled the girl’s belly for emphasis, causing the bloated redhead to giggle and belch.

         “Yeah but, I mean, I’m really fat! I can’t even get myself off the couch!” Hearing this made Delia’s heart beat faster. A familiar tingle shot up her spine, followed by a tinge of guilt.

         “What do you need to get up for?” Delia asked.

         Couch life was just fine, wasn’t it? Food whenever she wanted, a cozy (and consequently custom-shaped) couch under her rear, and hundreds of channels to watch. The motherly instinct inside Delia began to worry that she wasn’t doing enough.

         “Just want to stretch my legs really, take a look at this gut in the mirror, maybe take a shower...” At this, Delia looked at the girl’s body as if she hadn’t noticed the mess before. “Ooh, and I’d really like to weigh myself too. Last time I checked I was a bit over three twenty, but that was… a while ago.”

         Just how long ago was that? She looked down and lifted her gut with both hands, letting it plop back down. How had she lost track of time so easily? It was all just a blur.

         “Well dear, if you really want to get up I can help.” Delia heaved her own bottom-heavy mass forwards, struggling to her feet after a few moments of effort.

         “Looks like I’m not the only one,” Misty teased.

         Delia chuckled but then thought for a moment. What happens when if I can’t get up? What then? Who’s going to feed Misty if she can’t even get up? The mother pushed her concerns for later. She still had to help Misty up.

         Extending her arms, Misty grabbed Delia’s hands like a vice grip, heaving forwards once again. Delia pulled as hard as she could, using her own weight as leverage. Slowly but surely, the blob of a girl was lifted out of the couch’s concavity. Delia almost tumbled backwards.

         From this upright angle, Misty noticed the extent of Delia’s added adipose. The mother’s too tight shirt served as a bra, stained by splotches of food. Her rear and thighs had the biggest change by far, scarcely covered by a pair of tortured sweats.

         Misty saw this, and she… liked it? Not in some weird perverted way or anything! She loved her own fat body, but to see someone else grow so large—someone who Misty loved dearly—made Misty all warm and tingly inside, like her belly was filled by something other than vast quantities of food.

         The more she thought about it, the more entranced by Delia’s body she became.

         “Is *huff* something *huff* wrong sweetie?” a still exhausted Delia asked, noticing Misty’s nervous stare.

         “Oh! Uh- nothing! Just thinking about uh, dinner.”

         “Got some ideas?”

         “Up to you Delly.”

         “Actually I was thinking I might get us catering tonight. Some new restaurant just opened up in town and I figured I could use a break from cooking for once.”

         “Oh that’s nice! You do work really hard to keep me fed. I wouldn’t want you to get overworked or anything.”

         “It’s no trouble dear really-”

         “Delia, I insist. For the next few days, you’re going to sit that big butt of yours down and relax.”

         Delia smiled. “Just shout if you need anything, I’ll call this place up.”
141112111111121131131.title: One week later...

choices: The catering is amazing! But something seems off about these guys...
1411121111111211311311.content:
After stepping in the bathroom, Misty took a good long look at herself in the mirror, astonished at what she saw.

         Misty's gut hung just beyond her knees, separated into several large rolls of fat. If she could see past it, she would have seen her thighs pressed together for a majority of their length. Above her gut were two head-sized breasts with a surprising amount of perk for their weight. A small chin poked out from under her cherubic face. Turning around, she observed the layers of back fat resting atop the shelf of her wide rear. Beneath were her smooth tree-trunk legs.

         Furthermore, she was an absolute mess. Smears and smudges of grease, chocolate, ketchup, and however many other different things were present all over her face and body. Underneath one of her belly’s fat rolls she found a stray fry, and after some careful observation, she popped it into her mouth, smiling at it’s salty flavor.

         As far as clothing goes, she’d done away with pants weeks ago, instead opting for the bare minimum, not that it really mattered; Her panties weren’t even visible past her folds of fat, and it’d been quite some time since she ditched bras altogether as well, swapping them out for t-shirts. The current old shirt was quite literally bursting at the seams.

         By Arceus… I’m so… FAT! Rubbing her belly, she whispered quietly to it. ”You wanna just keep getting bigger, don’chya?”

         Her belly rumbled in affirmation.

         ”You just want me to eat more and more, and you’ll get fatter and fatter, huh? And best of all, Delia will be even happier the bigger you get… She’ll rub you when I’m full, and stuff you when I’m not… You like that, huh?”

         This is what you wanted… Isn’t it? The voice echoed once more. Looking down at her gut, she pondered only a moment.

         ”Yeah… this is definitely what I wanted. Let’s see just how big you’ve gotten Misty…”

         Bending down, she struggled to reach the scale in the corner. She leaned in as close as she could, only a mere inch away from grabbing-

         *TWANG*

         “Huh?” She stood back upright and looked behind her. On the ground were the pink panties that’d snapped, tattered and useless. Misty chuckled and shrugged it off.

         ------

         ”Hello, this is Josh from Hypno Brothers’ Diner and Catering, how can I help you?”

         “Hello Josh, just to make sure, you offer catering services correct?”

         ”Err… yes ma’am we do. It’s in the name. That includes anything on the menu you’d like. We do breakfast, lunch, dinner, and desserts.”

         “Wonderful, I’d like to place an order for tonight then…”

         From the brochure menu in hand—which seemed more like a short novel—Delia picked out their customized feast for the night, gave her address, and thanked them for their service.

         ”Delia!”

         What happens if I can’t get back up? As the thought resurged, it made Delia shudder, though out of fear or glee she didn’t know. I’m going to need someone to help…

         “Delia!” She snapped out of thought.

         “Just a minute dear!”

         Not a moment later, Delia leapt into action, charging down the hallway like a stampeding elephant ready to protect her young.

         “What is it? What’s wrong?” Delia burst into the bathroom, ready for anything.

         Misty was looking down with a pout on her face. “...I can’t read the scale… I’m too fat.”

         Relieved that it wasn’t something major, Delia shifted around to where she could see the results. Having not checked in a while herself, her jaw dropped.

         “What is it?” Misty asked excitedly.

         “Uh… uhm… 582.”

         “What?! That’s almost twice as much as when I last checked!” Misty was overjoyed, and Delia was drooling. “Now it’s your turn!”

         “Oh- If you insist…” Delia stepped up and Misty read the scale.

         “433! Looks like you still have a lot of catching up to do Delly!” Misty grabbed her fluffy love handles from behind, catching the mother off guard. Delia stood flustered, somewhat aroused at how much she’d grown.

         “Wait what do you mean catching up?”

         “Well isn’t it obvious silly? You need to start eating like me to get results like this!” Misty slapped her gut to emphasize.

         By Arceus, if she's implying what I think she is...
1411121111111211311311.title: Continue

choices: Tag along with Glee back at the restaurant.
14111211111112113113111.content:
A ring at the doorbell signalled dinner’s arrival. Delia put her gallon of ice cream down to greet them, struggling once more to escape the cushiony clutches of her couch.

“Misty! Food’s here!”

By the time she reached the door Delia was out of breath, wiping beads of sweat from her brow. She opened it to find…

“...Nurse Joy?”

“Oh silly me! I guess I do look like her don’t I? Hehe! She’s my cousin, so I can see why you’d mistake us! My name is Glee, and I’ll be serving you today!” Despite her age, the petite girl’s voice was prepubescent in nature. Her eyes glimmered a deep purple that matched her hair.

“Nice to meet you Glee, come right on in—it’s getting awfully cold out this time of year!”

At this the delicate girl gave a whistle and motioned behind her. A caravan of Nidoqueens followed her in, bringing cart upon cart of food with them to the kitchen. Delia's eyes widened at just how much they wheeled in. ’I didn’t order this much, did I?’ She ended up rationalizing that she must have. Surely no restaurant would be foolish enough to give out more food than was being paid for.

A few moments later, Misty waddled her bulk down the hall and plopped her freshly showered rear in the couch’s depression, causing the frame to creak and groan. Her fat body spilled out and spanned two of the three available seats, her belly just barely grazing the floor. The only thing keeping her from complete nudity was a clean t-shirt to contain her breasts.

“Oh, uhm actually could we take it all to the living room? The couch is a bit more comfortable for us at our- ehm, endowment.”

Glee looked at Delia, then the couch, then Delia again. There was no way in hell she’d be able to wedge her monstrous ass next to Misty’s, but in Delia’s mind she fit just fine, not fully realizing her true size.

“Eh, I think I’ve got something that can help…” Snapping her fingers, the Nidoqueens jumped into action. One single-handedly lifted Misty up from the couch and on placed her back down on a new cushiony seat. The behemoth of a girl didn’t have time to fully understand what was going on, but she felt pure bliss as her body slowly sank into the memory foam below. Poking bits of broken furniture would be a thing of the past. As the comfort was setting in, Misty released a loud fart.

Delia almost said something about behaving so impolitely, but Glee just giggled and insisted Delia try out her new seat next to Misty’s.

“This is our specially designed new seating structure made with larger people in mind. Memory foam cushions and adaptable seat sizing guarantees twenty-four hour luxury for anybody, no matter how fat you are!”

“And… how much is this going to cost me Glee?” Delia asked, slightly annoyed that she’d be paying extra for something she didn’t ask for.

“Oh free of charge—think of it as an investment.”

What? What kind of restaurant makes custom furniture, let alone for free?

Skeptically, Delia slowly lowered her meaty rear into the seat. “Oh… oh my…” Delia’s eyes rolled back as she let out a soft moan and a fart of her own.

Glee giggled once more, finding their flatulence to be rather cute. She dismissed her assistants and brought the first cart forwards. “Alright, looks like it’s time to get to work!”

------

Misty and Delia leaned back and groaned, once again covered in their respective meals. The past two hours had been a flurry of feeding, with Glee taking every opportunity she could to cram as much fatty food as she could into their gullets.

“Hope you two have room for dessert!” From the kitchen she wheeled out a wedding cake for each girl. One triple chocolate for Misty, and a one vanilla almond for Delia. Rather than feed it to them by hand, she placed the cakes on their respective bloated guts and said “Dig in ladies!”

Despite how much they’d eaten and how utterly stuffed they were, unadulterated gluttony took hold of them. With their bare hands they began shovelling the dense cake towards their mouths, disregarding the sheer amount that missed their target entirely. They practically smothered their bodies in cake and icing in the process of stuffing themselves as fast as possible. By the time they finished, they were both caked in nearly an inch thick layer of… well… cake!

“Now to wash it all down!” The purple-haired mistress revealed a gallon of thick yellow shake for each girl and insisted on pouring all of it down their throats. If the two had ever thought they knew what full felt like, it was nothing compared to what they felt now. They were both out of breath and groaning in pain. They leaned back as far as they could, finding that their new seating doubled as a luxury bed.

Unable to think about anything besides how full she was, Delia forgot about payment entirely as her mind fell into a deep haze.

“Alright you two, looks like my work here is done!” Glee leaned over and planted a kiss on the bloated slobs’ foreheads, licking up the cake that collected on her lips. “I’ll see you tomorrow morning!”

Glee closed the door behind her.

It was as if everything froze.

Silence permeated the air, only to be broken by an encore of burps and farts.

The two wallowed in delectable filth as they drifted off into a deep food coma.

Business was still booming despite how late out it was—some customers had even come down from Vermillion City to check this place out. Most of them were rail-thin with only a few exceptions, and a devious grin crept across her face.

         Empty trays and carts from the Glee’s outing were wheeled to a platform hidden in the kitchen, and at the press of a button they were lowered into the basement.

         How the boss managed to keep it hidden from the Health and Ethics committee was beyond her, but she had a few ideas, none of them ethical in the slightest. The plates and carts were left with dozens of others ready to be cleaned. Glee took a moment to admire the efficiency of their underground assembly line. Conveyor belts carried the trays through an industrial washer, followed by dozens of pokemon working their hardest to load them with as much food as possible. With just a few additives, you quite literally can’t have just one bite.

         Through the restricted access door Glee strolled past all sorts of processing machinery working at full capacity. Liquids of all colors bubbled, mixed, and swirled through intricate glass pipeways, with the end product being collected in tall glass vats. A fine purplish powder.

         One more set of doors lead the purple-haired girl to a room of monitors. Two people were seated with a Hypno on either side. The identical brothers turned around to see her.

         “Ah you’re back” one of them said.

         “We’re very pleased with your work,” said the other.

         “We’ve decided to give you the go-ahead on your project. We’ve granted a 50% increase to their food supply.”

         “We expect to see results. Don’t disappoint.” They both looked at one of the monitors and snickered. On it lay Misty and Delia in all of their repulsive glory, sprawled out and sleeping like rocks.

         Glee bowed and thanked the two before turning around to leave.

         “Before you go, we have an experimental new additive to try. Give it to the mother and record results over the next three days. Good luck.”

         They handed her a new vial of powder, this time a pale green color. Glee nodded and left.

         Delia slept peacefully, unaware of what was about to unfold.

         Something was different about this new powder… but what?

To Belle’s surprise, catering wasn’t too unlike her job at the restaurant, though instead of carrying trays back and forth from table to table, she only had to worry about feeding two very large customers.

Though she was originally disgusted by the hoggish behavior and pigsty of a house, it affected her less and less as the week progressed. She even considered the laid back nature of her new position to be a decent trade off for the hectic environment back in the restaurant.

Belle was astounded by how much larger Misty and Delia had grown in the mere span of seven days, as they only spiraled further into their sinful hedonism—she would go far as to guess about 120 extra pounds found their way to Misty, and almost 200 on Delia, meaning Misty was over 700 lbs with Delia tailing close behind.

Any semblance of mobility once present in their bodies was now buried beneath layer upon layer of food-laden flab. While Delia retained her overall pear shape, her sweaty ass and colossal thighs now competed for dominance with her growing gut. Misty continued to grow all over, though her multi-tiered gut now had a pair of fluffy arm pillows protruding from either side. Her breasts now drooped freely, unrestricted by and shirt or bra after outgrowing her largest one. It wasn’t as if she cared though, if anything she finally felt liberated from the confines of fabric, now lying nude and coated with food of all sort.

It perplexed Belle how it was even possible for someone to grow so quickly, thanking Arceus that she managed to stay rail-thin for so long. Though it could easily could have gone unnoticed, Belle’s keen eye told her Glee had not—a soft layer a pudge was now present over the purple-haired girl. It was negligible, but a gain nonetheless.

------

Misty and Delia were in the middle of their day-long feasts. Glee struggled to feed both girls by hand as the demands to be fed only grew, while Belle kept to the logistics of things, preferring not to get too up close and personal with the growing flatulent blobs.

Wiping sweat from her brow, Glee looked back at Belle. “Hey cutie! Mind giving me a hand over here?”

Belle only stood silent.

“Aww c’mon~ it’s not too hard! They don’t bite!” She took a moment to giggle at her own joke. “Come on over here, I’ll help ya out for a bit.”

Belle stepped forwards, a platter of hotdogs in hand.

“It can be a bit tricky to reach over them sometimes, so I find it much easier to get on top and go from there. You can feed Delly and I’ll feed my Misty! This is gonna be so much fun!!!” At that Glee jumped into Misty’s naked lap and started feeding her.

The Kalos girl looked up at Delia. “Are yue sure zis is fine?”

“Oh don’t be so worried sweetie, hop on up.” She gave a reassuring smile.

Hesitant, Belle sat down in her lap, noting how soft the fat beneath felt. It was as if she’d leapt upon a cloud of pleasure she’d until now denied herself. So soft that she needed to feel more of it. “D-do yue mind if I…?”

“Go ahead.”

The blonde gently pressed her palm against Delia’s belly, feeling the fluff conform and swallow it whole. Curious, she took a handful of fat and jiggled it softly, watching the ripples make their way across the immense body.

Delia was in heaven. She’d long ago admired and encouraged Misty’s gain, and here she was now, having her own blubbery form fondled and caressed. Her heart started racing time itself. Grabbing hold of Belle’s wrist startled the girl, but they now looked deep into one another’s eyes.

“Feed me.”

Obedient, Belle fed her a hotdog.

“More,” Delia commanded.

Belle fed her more of them one at a time, slowly though.

“Belie dear, when I say more, I mean more”

As if something had snapped into place inside, Belle became a relentless flurry, cramming as much food into Delia’s mouth as possible. When her plate was empty, she tossed it aside and replaced it with a dozen donuts, and a pizza after that, and so on and so forth. The stark contrast from the Bell they knew demanded the attention of the two sat beside them.

Hours of passionate feeding flew by until nightfall soon crept in. The pokemon wheeled empty carts back out to the van and drove back to the restaurant, while Glee and Belle slept atop their slobby companions.

As Delia was about to fall asleep, she realized and unfamiliar feeling pressing from within. She was full. Not just that... she was STUFFED! With Belle here to feed her, there was no telling how big Delia would get. Delia smiled at this thought, and drifted off to sleep.

As the days went on and as her body grew fatter, unknowingly, Misty’s vocabulary grew smaller, not that she spoke very often anyways. When she did speak though, her words were short and unsophisticated like that of a toddler, lacking the polysyllabic nature others expressed during any given dialogue.

The girl’s tree trunk legs were spread as far as they could, giving space for the immense gut that hung beyond her dimpled knees and past the couch’s edge, less than a foot away from the ground. Having not been bathed nor wiped down by Delia recently—something she had just not cared to do as of late—Misty’s sloppy eating left all manner of debris scattered about her body. Chocolate was caked all around her lips, and a trail of grease as well as all other manner of food that dripped into her cleavage could be seen.

         *FRRRRRRTTTT* Misty grunted and sighed with content. “Feed me more Delly! I wants to get even fatter!” Without skipping a beat, Delia rushed over and fed the bloated bimbo food by the handful, not without having some for herself too of course! She would play with the girl’s fat body while teasing her playfully, eliciting farts and giggles from the empty-headed hog of a girl.

141112111111121133.content:
300 pounds...

Just two and a half weeks and she nearly tripled her weight. All because of Delia and her powder.

Misty sat on the side of her bed. She cradled her belly, squeezing her love handles. It felt like forever since it'd been a flat, toned abdomen. The gut she had now felt totally natural, despite the fact she'd grown it at an unnaturally fast pace. The way it filled her lap, the way her constant glutting left it packed at all times, the way she couldn't help rubbing and squeezing it during alone time... It all felt so natural to her, like she was meant to be this way.

She sighed. "It's not her fault I like this, right?"

Surely Delia would have mentioned the powder having mind-altering properties if it did. Surely. Right?

"I'll ask her about it tomorrow. Among other things."

Originally, Misty intended to ask Delia everything right back then and there. But then she caught sight of those marshmallows and her mind just sort of...not really blanked, more like pushed aside all other thoughts in favor of food. Frustrating, but at least that gave her a chance to back out of the situation and think things over before confronting Delia in earnest. And got a nice snack. Speaking of which, she could probably go back and find a bag of chips or--

No. She shook her head. No more letting her appetite control her. At least, not unless she decided she liked living this way... Which she kind of already did, but Delia's confession made her want to reevaluate that.

A yawn suddenly escaped her lips. "Guess it's best to sleep on it," she muttered as she slipped under the covers. Questions plagued her conscious thought, making it difficult to settle down. Annoyed, she tried thinking about what tomorrow's breakfast would be and found her mood immediately lifting.

No matter what I feel about Delia's lying, Misty thought, I'll always love her cooking.

-----

Snow crunched beneath Misty's feet as she trudged through the bellowing snowstorm. The wind blew directly at her, making each step a struggle. Not helping that was the hefty bundle of winter wear she wore. Kept her from freezing, but really heavy and restrictive. And her snow goggles, while effective at keeping her eyes safe, didn't offer much in the way of visibility. It looked like she was wondering around in a void of snow and absolutely nothing else. Felt like it, too.

It also felt like she'd been wondering around forever. How long had she been out here? How much longer till she found somewhere to hide from the storm? Would she find somewhere to hide?

As if on cue, a house practically materialized in front of her. Happy and relieved, Misty upped her pace as best she could and hurried to the front door. Once there, she knocked fiercely and rapidly. She waited a moment. No response. Glancing back to the vast expanse of nothing, she knocked again. Again, nothing. She raised her arm to knock again when, finally, the door opened. Muttering her thanks, she rushed inside and slammed the door shut behind her.

She wasted no time removing her hat, goggles, and scarf from her head. Her hair fell down over her back, her usual ponytail absent. She looked around and was surprised to find it was Delia's home. Yet the woman herself wasn't there. "Uh, hello?" she called out. "Delia? Thank you for letting me in. I really appreciate it."

"Think nothing of it, dear!"

Delia, all smiles, walked out of the kitchen door, came over to Misty and helped remove her jacket. "I'm surprised to see you out and about, given the weather! What were you doing out there?"

"Um..." Misty searched for an answer, but found none.

"Well, never mind that." Delia started back to the kitchen. "Your timing's impeccable. I was just making some hot chocolate! Care for some?"

Misty's face lit up. "Of course!"

Giggling, Delia opened the door and ushered Misty in. "Then come on in! I'm also baking cookies."

Having removed her boots, Misty followed her in and licked her lips. The scent of fresh baked chocolate chip filled the air. "Mmm, smells great."

"Then help yourself!" Delia gestured to a large bowl filled to the brim cookies on the table. "I've got another batch on the way in case you need more!"

A sudden hunger claimed Misty. This was no mere hankering for a snack or anything small like that. No, this was a deep and powerful need, as though she hadn't eaten in days. She felt like she could eat like a Snorlax and still need more. "Yeah," she said more to herself than Delia, "I might need that second batch... Maybe even a third..."

Delia pat her on the head. "I'll make as many as you want, dear."

As if prompted by Delia's words, Misty's stomach roared. Misty hesitated for just a moment before diving into the bowl. She crammed cookie after cookie into her mouth, only stopping to chew when she couldn't fit any more in. How she didn't hurt her jaw doing this was anyone's guess. Regardless, she continued eating in this manner with the next mouthful. And the next, and the next, and...

She couldn't stop. She didn't want to stop. Her hunger felt bottomless, and the cookies tasted so good! Besides, there were so many. As huge as the bowl was, it seemed even larger than it looked. It took forever to make a noticeable dent in the batch. A small part of her--the only part not focused on eating--fretted over how shameful she looked. Just barging into Delia's house unannounced and stuffing herself full of cookies that weren't even meant for her, it was just--

"They're all for you, sweetie. I knew you were coming, that's why I made so many."

... Wait, really?

"I know what you want. And I know how much you need it."

Well, she was hungry...

"Sooo hungry. I bet this isn't even putting a dent in your hunger."

That's true, come to think of it. If anything, she only seemed to get hungrier with each mouthful.

"This teeny little batch could never be enough. You've got such a healthy appetite, you know?"

Yes, a very healthy appetite.

"That's why I'm making another."

Something pushed against the waistband of Misty's pants. She pulled them down with one hand while the other kept shoveling cookies into her maw.

"And another."

Her butt and legs stretched and strained the material.

"And another."

Her breast tested the limits of her shirt and bra.

"And another."

Her sleeves struggled against puffy biceps.

"And another."

Her jiggling chin gave way to another.

"And another."

And another.

"And another."

And another...

"And another, until my big, growing girl is satisfied."

Mmm...

"Oh my, you finished that even quicker than usual. You just make yourself comfortable and I'll get the next one ready for you."

More... Need more...

Misty closed her eyes as she relished the aftertaste. Still starved like heck, but much better than before. Moaning happily, she moved to sit her big, flabby butt down...

...only to find herself laying down. She opened her eyes and saw...
141112111111121133.title: Misty has a strange dream, one that helps sort ...

1411121111111211331.content:
"Huh...?"

A vast expanse of blue, dotted with the occasional cloud. A flock of Wingull flew by.

"When did I get outside? I was just in... Just in... Uh..."

Misty was somewhere indoors before just now, that much she remembered. But where was that somewhere? She tried to recall it. Nothing definite came to mind, but she did recall a sense of warmth. A loving kind of warmth, to be specific. The same kind she felt right now.

Something stroked her stomach. Heart skipping a beat, Misty looked down to see a slender hand trailing across her muffin top. Said hand then reached up to her head and turned it to the right, where Delia's gentle smile greeted her.

"Good morning, sleepyhead." A light giggle punctuated Delia's greeting. The softness of her voice made Misty's heart flutter.

For a moment, Misty couldn't respond. That half-lidded gaze, that twinkle in Delia's eyes, those lips. Dear Arceus above, those lips. They looked so soft, so kissable, so...so perfect. Misty couldn't imagine a more beautiful pair of lips if she tried. In fact, maybe it was her imagination but Delia herself looked even more beautiful than usual. Perhaps it had something to do with how her hair seemed to shine in the sunlight...

Finally, Misty managed an almost whispered "Good morning."

Delia giggled again. "I told you this cruise was a good idea." She ran her fingers down Misty's cheek as she pulled away, shifting from laying on her side to her back. "Just the two of us, all alone at sea... And all the food we could ever want, of course."

This time it was Misty's turn to giggle. "But do we really? I have been eating a lot more recently..." As she made that remark, her eyes trailed down her body.

As one could infer from the aforementioned muffin top, Misty had forgone her old swimmer's build for something a bit plumper. An all-around coat of fat layered her whole body. A little rounder here, some thickness there, mixed with some tender loving care and she'd transformed herself into the perfect glutton-in-training. The fact a good portion of her fat centered on her middle and lower body didn't hurt either. Her one-piece sport swimsuit was at least two sizes too small for her now, but there was an odd appeal to see it struggle to contain everything.

"Oh believe me," Delia said, doing her own once-over of Misty's body, "I'm quite aware. That's why I made sure to bring everything I can."

Misty blushed, her smile turning bashful. Delia continued to admire her pudgy partner for a few more moments. A gentle breeze blew over them as they both shifted onto their backs. The sky still looked as perfect as ever.

"Beautiful, isn't it?" Misty waited for a response, but none came. "Delia?" She turned to find the beautiful woman's eyes closed, intertwined hands resting just beneath her chest which rose and fell with each gentle breath.

Grinning to herself, Misty slowly and quietly stood up from the two-person pool chair and stretched. Her swimsuit groaned. Wouldn't be too long, now. The poor thing couldn't last much longer, especially since it was the last of her old clothes.

Which was kind of exciting, in a way. It almost felt like she was shedding the last of her old self's shell. Scary, but again, kind of exciting.

"Let's see, what to do..."

Part of her yearned to go for a swim since it'd been so long. Another part of her just wanted to grab a snack...

Walking past the pool, she leaned on the guard rail and gazed out into the distance. Nothing but sky and sea for miles in every direction. It was as though she and Delia were off in their own little part of the world, free to enjoy each other's company in peace and solitude. No need to worry about the rest of world and its opinions on her growing body. Here, she could just be what she wanted with the wonderful woman she-

Something suddenly covered her eyes; it felt like hands. The body said hands belonged to pressed against her back. Misty gasped, then fell silent. The panic drained out of her, a calming stillness taking its place. The hands left her face and came down to wrap around her middle. Despite this, she kept her eyes closed.

"Do you feel it, Misty?" A voice. Delia's. Its breath tickled Misty's ear. "Do you feel how big you've gotten?"

Delia's hands began to play with Misty's belly, then slid down to squeeze her thighs. Back up her belly, stopping to pinch her developing love handles, then resuming their journey till they came to cup her breasts. Misty didn't react. She maintained her relaxed state as Delia groped them through the swimsuit.

"You used to be so small. Just feel how much bigger and heavier you've become."

A tingle ran up Misty's spine. She wanted to shudder, moan, do something. But she didn't, she couldn't.

"Do you think you're big enough? Do you want to stop here?"

Did she? Was she content as is?

Delia giggled. "Of course not. You want more. Much, much, much more."

More...

The words seeped into Misty's head, as if they became her own thoughts.

"I know you do. What I want is what you want."

What Delia wants is what Misty wants...?

"You have noticed how much you've changed, haven't you? Not just in body, but in heart and mind too. Exercise, running a gym... None of the things you used to love interest you anymore. More and more, all you care about is your next meal. All you think about is me and my food that you love oh so much."

Had it come from anyone else, Misty might have been insulted by such words, true though they may be. In fact, just the mention of food left her feeling a bit peckish...

"And who can blame you? I can't. I'm the one making you this way, shaping you into the perfect glutton."

A memory came to the forefront of Misty's mind. Her and Delia, talking in the kitchen. Something about a powder, some kind of "gaining supplement", and putting on almost 200 pounds in a few weeks time. There was something after that... What was it again?

"And I know you won't say no. You can't say no. You love being a growing girl. My growing girl. You want to grow fatter and fatter. I want you to grow fatter and fatter."

A strange feeling suffused her body. Fatter and fatter...and fatter and fatter... All thanks to Delia.

"So grow. Grow for me, Misty. Grow for yourself. Become the helpless blob of a feedee we want you to be."

Every part of her tingled from the feeling. Large amounts of it centered around her head and belly. Thinking became difficult and a hunger unlike any she ever felt before took hold. Food, she needed food. All the filling, fattening food she could stomach. No swimming, no managing gyms. None of that would help her grow. Only Delia could do that.

"Yes, my dear, indulge the hunger. Embrace it. Become it. You cannot stay a little girl anymore. No, you must become your true self: the fat, insatiable woman you are meant to be. Eat and grow.

"And become mine forever."

----------

The Heart of the Matter: She's accepted her gluttony, she's realized Delia's influence, now Misty needs to face the source of her conflicted feelings: herself. But with two and a half weeks of conditioned behavior at odds with her old life, what will her "self" even look like? What path will it try to push her towards?

Awakened Anew - Reborn a Glutton: Misty wakes up the next morning, her decision made. Whatever ethical concerns Delia's actions may bring up, she doesn't care. As long as she gets to eat and grow with Delia there to pamper and love her, nothing else matters.

Awakened Anew - Resolved to Confront: Misty wakes up the next morning, rattled by her nightmare. Scared into action, she bites the bullet and goes to confront Delia about the last few weeks. After breakfast, of course.
